translation.en: -Well, I expect it'll cloud over later on. -[ferryman] Aye.
What's going on at Sutton Hoo, then?
[man] There's a lady who's got an excavating job.
translation.zh: ‎有位女士想让我进行挖掘工作

translation.en: -Ah, thank you kindly. Mind how you go. -Thank you.
Mornin'. Mrs. Pretty, please.
translation.zh: ‎早安 我是来找普莱提太太的

translation.en: Basil Brown.
Wait here.
-Should we take a look at them, then? -[Brown] Right.
Things like this are usually done through museums.
translation.zh: ‎这种事通常是通过博物馆处理的

translation.en: [Pretty] Yes. But when I approached Ipswich,
translation.zh: ‎是 但当我找上伊普斯威奇博物馆时

translation.en: Mr. Reid Moir said that, with the war coming, they couldn't embark upon any new ventures.
translation.zh:
‎里德摩尔先生说战争即将来临
‎他们无法展开新的挖掘工程

translation.en: [Brown] Well, they have their hands full with a Roman villa.
translation.zh: ‎确实 罗马别墅的挖掘就够他们忙了

translation.en: -Yes. He said you were working on it. -[Brown] I am.
translation.zh:
‎-是 他说那项工程是你负责的
‎-没错

translation.en: He told me you were a difficult man.
[chuckles] Did he, now?
Unorthodox… and untrained.
translation.zh: ‎反常规 而且未经过训练

translation.en: [Brown] Hmm. So that's his reference, is it?
[chuckles] Well, I'm… I'm not untrained.
I've been on dig since I was old enough to hold a trowel.
translation.zh: ‎我从会握镘刀开始就投身于挖掘工作

translation.en: [sighs] My father taught me.
Perhaps Reid Moir just wants to keep you for himself.
translation.zh:
‎也许摩尔先生
‎只是想把你留在身边为己所用

translation.en: -[Brown] I don't know about that. -[both chuckle]
[Brown] I've always had a curiosity to see these here mounds.
translation.zh:
‎我一直对这些土墩很好奇
‎想亲眼见识下

translation.en: -Henry VIII came here to dig. -[Pretty] So I'm told.
translation.zh: ‎亨利八世曾在这里挖掘过 ‎我听说过

translation.en: [Brown] Well, no record of what he found.
translation.zh: ‎历史并没记载他发现了什么

translation.en: [Pretty] My husband and I bought this land, with the hope of exploring what was under there.
translation.zh:
‎我和我丈夫买下这块地
‎希望能一探究竟底下埋着些什么

translation.en: -But… Well, best-laid plans. -[Brown chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎不过嘛 计划赶不上变化

translation.en: [Pretty] What are they? Would you hazard a guess?
translation.zh: ‎让你猜的话 你觉得它们是什么？

translation.en: [Brown] Burial mounds, I expect.
We're standing in someone's graveyard, I reckon.
translation.zh: ‎我估计 我们正站在某人的墓地里

translation.en: Viking…
or maybe older.
Apparently, local girls used to lie down on them in the hope of falling pregnant.
translation.zh:
‎据说以前 想怀孕的当地女孩们
‎会过来躺在这些土墩上

translation.en: I've heard plenty of legends.
Is that why you want to dig, Mrs. Pretty?
Tales of buried treasure?
My interest in archaeology began like yours, when I was scarcely old enough to hold a trowel.
translation.zh:
‎和你一样 我从几乎会握镘刀开始
‎就对考古感兴趣

translation.en: My childhood home was built on a Cistercian convent.
translation.zh:
‎我儿时的家
‎就建在一座西多会修道院上

translation.en: I helped my father excavate the apse.
translation.zh:
‎我协助我父亲
‎将其半圆形后殿挖掘了出来

translation.en: That speaks, don't it?
The past.
You have rabbits, Mrs. Pretty.
translation.zh: ‎你这里有兔子 普莱提太太

translation.en: Yes, I am aware of that. [chuckles]
[Brown] Rabbits burrow.
They're bad for excavations.
I'd like to start with this one.
[Brown] Ah, I wouldn't start with this one, Mrs. Pretty, not personally speaking.
translation.zh:
‎普莱提太太 就我个人而言
‎我不会从这个开始

translation.en: -[Pretty] Why not? -'Cause that dips in the middle, see?
translation.zh: ‎为什么？ ‎这个中间陷下去了 看到吗？

translation.en: And the soil feels-- That's compacted.
Thieves used to sink shafts in.
translation.zh: ‎以前的盗墓贼会垂直向下挖一个竖井

translation.en: Robber's flutes, they're called.
Anything they found would've been melted down and sold long ago.
translation.zh:
‎他们找到的珍宝
‎早就已经被熔化并卖掉了

translation.en: I expect you might be better off with… one of these.
translation.zh: ‎我认为你最好还是从那个开始

translation.en: But I have a feeling about this one.
[Brown] Well, that's your money, Mrs. Pretty, but I'd base your dig on evidence,
translation.zh:
‎钱是你的 普莱提太太
‎但我会以证据为根据

translation.en: not feeling.
[Pretty] As for money, would 1 pound, 15 shillings, and 6 pence a week be acceptable?
translation.zh:
‎至于工资
‎每周1英镑15先令6便士可以吗？

translation.en: -No. -[Pretty] I asked Reid Moir what he pays.
translation.zh:
‎不行 ‎我问了摩尔先生
‎他说就付你这么多

translation.en: -That was his reply. -Well, he don't pay enough.
translation.zh:
‎我问了摩尔先生
‎他说就付你这么多 ‎他付的根本就不够

translation.en: -[footsteps approach] -[Pretty] All right. I'm afraid that's all I can reasonably afford to spend.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我恐怕只能拿出这么多钱了

translation.en: -[boy shouting] -[Brown] Right, then. Understood.
Robert, where did you get that gas mask? Take it off.
translation.zh: ‎罗伯特 你上哪弄来的防毒面具？ ‎脱下来

translation.en: -Sorry, I didn't realize you were-- -This is not a toy.
translation.zh:
‎-抱歉 我不知道你在…
‎-这不是玩具

translation.en: Robert, this is Mr. Brown.
-Hello there, young man. -[Robert] Robert Pretty. How do you do?
translation.zh: ‎你好啊 年轻人 ‎我是罗伯特普莱提 你好

translation.en: Who's coming after you? -Captain Laska and his gangsters. -[Brown] Oh!
translation.zh:
‎-谁在追你啊？
‎-拉斯卡船长和他的混混手下

translation.en: -[Pretty] Mr. Brown is an archaeologist. -Well, I'm an excavator.
translation.zh: ‎布朗先生是一名考古学家 ‎我是个挖掘专家

translation.en: -You've come to dig up the mounds? -[Brown] Well…
I'm afraid not. Uh, not today.
Excuse me.
-Good luck with your gangsters, Robert. -[Robert chuckles] Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎祝你顺利搞定那些小混混 罗伯特 ‎谢谢你

translation.en: [Brown] And you, with your dig, ma'am.
translation.zh: ‎也祝你的挖掘顺利 太太

translation.en: Ah, blast.
-Mr. Brown? -Yes?
Billy Lyons. Uh, uh, from Mrs. Pretty.
translation.zh:
‎我是比利莱恩斯
‎这是普莱提太太给你的

translation.en: All right.
Tell her Monday, 8:00 sharp.
[Brown] I won't work for less than two pound a week.
And it's too far to bike, if you want a day's digging.
translation.zh:
‎你若想让我进行一整天的挖掘
‎骑自行车就太远了

translation.en: [Pretty] You could lodge with the Lyonses in the coach house.
translation.zh:
‎你可以和莱恩斯一家
‎一起住在马车房里

translation.en: Mr. Lyons is my chauffeur, and Mrs. Lyons is in charge of the kitchen.
translation.zh:
‎莱恩斯先生是我的司机
‎而莱恩斯太太则负责管理厨房

translation.en: -[Brown sighs] Well, I'll need help. -[Pretty] I could let you have one man.
translation.zh: ‎我需要帮手 ‎我能给你安排一个助手

translation.en: [Brown] Two would be better.
[Pretty] I'm glad we could come to an arrangement after all, Mr. Brown.
translation.zh:
‎我很高兴我们最终还是达成了协议
‎布朗先生

translation.en: John Jacobs and Mr. Spooner are bringing the shepherd's hut.
translation.zh:
‎约翰雅各布斯和斯普纳先生
‎会把牧羊人小屋带过来

translation.en: I thought it might be useful in case of inclement weather.
translation.zh: ‎遇到恶劣天气时也许用得上

translation.en: Oh, that's very considerate.
My son Robert is keen to assist you in any way.
translation.zh: ‎我儿子罗伯特 非常热切地想协助你

translation.en: If you find his presence irksome--
Oh, no, no, no. He can come.
You'll start with this one?
[Brown] Yeah.
I reckon we can forget that larger mound, Mrs. Pretty.
translation.zh:
‎还是忘了那个比较大的土墩吧
‎普莱提太太

translation.en: This one here, that's where we'll find something.
Well, shan't hold you up. [chuckles softly]
[Brown] Thank you kindly.
If you ask me, the man should leave Mrs. Pretty's mounds well alone.
translation.zh:
‎要我说的话 那个男人
‎不应该碰普莱提太太的土墩

translation.en: -[maid] Thank you, ma'am. -[Pretty] Great, dear. Thank you.
Darling, please be gentle. You'll knock me down.
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 悠着点 你差点把我撞倒了

translation.en: [Robert] I'm sorry. Mr. Brown says to come.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 布朗先生让你过去找他

translation.en: -Now? -[Robert] Yes.
Well, thank you for the message.
Well, it looks like the kind of tray you get at a butcher's.
translation.zh: ‎看起来像肉铺里用的那种托盘

translation.en: And there's some blackness here, maybe indicating a fire was made.
translation.zh: ‎这些黑色的部分可能是火烧的痕迹

translation.en: Who are those men?
[Pretty] They're from the Ipswich Museum. Mr. Reid Moir telephoned me.
translation.zh:
‎他们是伊普斯威奇博物馆的人
‎摩尔先生给我打了电话

translation.en: He wanted to see how things were progressing, so I invited him.
translation.zh:
‎说想看看事情的进展
‎所以我就邀请他过来了

translation.en: Mrs. Pretty, this is Guy Maynard, our new curator.
translation.zh: ‎普莱提太太 ‎这是盖伊梅纳德 我们的新馆长

translation.en: -How do you do? -[Pretty] Hello.
Hello, Brown.
Maynard. Can I borrow you, please, for this here corner?
translation.zh: ‎梅纳德 能麻烦你过来搭把手吗？

translation.en: Jolly good.
[Brown] One.
-You have it? Two. -[Maynard] Yeah.
-[Brown] Three! Blast. -[Maynard grunts]
Is that the sum of your labors?
[Brown] Excuse me.
[Reid Moir] I must urge you, Mrs. Pretty, to support our Roman villa.
translation.zh:
‎普莱提太太
‎我促请你支持我们的罗马别墅工程

translation.en: War is looming. All hands are on deck to excavate before hostilities begin.
translation.zh:
‎战争迫在眉睫 在敌对行动爆发之前
‎我们需要全员出动进行挖掘

translation.en: And so, we must ask you to return Mr. Brown.
translation.zh: ‎因此我们得要求你归还布朗先生

translation.en: I'd like him to finish what he's started.
translation.zh: ‎我想让他完成他所开始的工程

translation.en: [Reid Moir chuckles] We may have found the largest Roman villa north of Felixstowe.
translation.zh:
‎我们可能找到了
‎费利克斯托北部最大的罗马别墅

translation.en: It's of far greater import, if… if you'll forgive me, than this…
translation.zh:
‎我们可能找到了
‎费利克斯托北部最大的罗马别墅 ‎恕我直言
‎这可比你的小工程要重要得多

translation.en: minor venture.
translation.zh:
‎恕我直言
‎这可比你的小工程要重要得多

translation.en: -Then the choice is Mr. Brown's. -Excuse me.
translation.zh:
‎选择权在于布朗先生 ‎不好意思 随着时间的推移
‎那块木头变成了一堆压实的沙子

translation.en: Time had altered that piece of wood to compacted sand.
translation.zh:
‎不好意思 随着时间的推移
‎那块木头变成了一堆压实的沙子

translation.en: I didn't guess its age correctly.
I speculated Viking, but I think that's older.
translation.zh:
‎我之前推测是维京时期
‎但我认为那还要更古老些

translation.en: -Anglo-Saxon. -That's most unlikely, Brown.
translation.zh:
‎-盎格鲁-撒克逊时期
‎-不可能 布朗

translation.en: We should-- We need you back at the villa. That's what I'm here to say, and…
translation.zh:
‎别墅那里需要你
‎我过来就是想说这个 而且…

translation.en: and Mrs. Pretty has released you.
translation.zh: ‎普莱提太太也说你可以走了

translation.en: I have said it is your choice.
Well, then I'll stay.
Thank you kindly, ma'am.
Excuse me.
Now, look here, Brown.
translation.zh: ‎布朗 听着 你的意思我们明白了

translation.en: You've made your point. You can have two pounds a week.
We'll give you a few days to finish off here, and then, as we're the only museum in the area,
translation.zh:
‎我们会给你几天时间善后 然后呢
‎鉴于我们是这地区唯一的博物馆

translation.en: I'd carefully consider where your future lies.
translation.zh: ‎我劝你还是为自己的未来着想

translation.en: Understood.
[Robert] Mr. Brown's been telling us all sorts of things.
translation.zh: ‎布朗先生跟我们说了种种事情

translation.en: For instance, what's the most important part of an archaeologist's body?
translation.zh:
‎例如 作为一名考古学家
‎身上哪个部位最重要？

translation.en: -I don't know. -[clock chiming]
His nose.
If there's something there, he'll know it by the smell.
translation.zh: ‎如果有遗物的话 他能靠鼻子闻出来

translation.en: You're going to see your father this afternoon?
I… I'm afraid I'm needed here.
translation.zh: ‎我恐怕走不开 这里需要我

translation.en: -Um, please, may I get down? -If you're quite sure you've finished.
translation.zh: ‎我可以离席了吗？ ‎吃饱了就去吧

translation.en: [man] Boiled beef… on a hot day like this is unlikely to agree with anyone, Mrs. Lyons.
translation.zh:
‎大热天吃水煮牛肉
‎任谁都受不了 莱恩斯太太

translation.en: [Pretty] It was exactly like last time.
[doctor] Mrs. Pretty, you produce all this acid because you're a worrier.
translation.zh:
‎普莱提太太
‎你的胃酸过多是操心太多所致

translation.en: We've spoken on this subject before.
translation.zh: ‎这个问题我们之前讨论过了

translation.en: -You must learn to stop worrying. -[sighs]
[doctor] Otherwise, you'll give yourself an ulcer.
translation.zh: ‎否则的话 会患上胃溃疡的

translation.en: -Well… if that's what you think. -[doctor] Mm-hmm.
Oh, you don't wanna be down there, Mrs. Pretty. That ain't safe.
translation.zh: ‎普莱提太太 别站在那里 那里不安全

translation.en: Spooner and John Jacobs are making supports. We can't continue without them now.
translation.zh:
‎斯普纳和约翰正在搭建支护结构
‎在那完成之前 我们无法继续

translation.en: I was reading Howard Carter's account of his excavation of the tomb of Tutankhamun.
translation.zh:
‎我读了霍华德卡特
‎对挖掘图坦卡蒙陵墓的叙述

translation.en: He stood at the threshold of the burial chamber,
the first man to do so for 3,000 years,
translation.zh: ‎这个三千年以来首个踏入陵墓的人

translation.en: and he saw finger marks still on the paint.
translation.zh: ‎看到油漆表面上还残留着手指印

translation.en: He say, "Time lost its meaning."
It occurs to me that you might unearth human remains.
translation.zh:
‎我突然想到
‎你可能会挖掘出人类的遗骸

translation.en: [Brown] Yeah, that's possible.
[Pretty] We're digging down to meet the dead.
translation.zh: ‎我们掘地三尺 与亡者会面

translation.en: Disinterring them, in fact.
translation.zh: ‎事实上 是掘出他们的尸体

translation.en: [Brown] There's always coroner's inquests when remains are found.
translation.zh:
‎每当发现遗骸
‎都必须交由验尸官进行勘验

translation.en: The dead still get that courtesy, no matter how many centuries they've lain.
translation.zh:
‎无论入土了多少个世纪
‎亡者仍享有这个基本权利

translation.en: We can't dig down into the earth without considering that--
translation.zh: ‎如果要往地底下挖 就必须考虑到…

translation.en: [Pretty, muffled] Brown?
Mr. Brown?
Spooner! Jacob! Get help!
translation.zh: ‎斯普纳！雅各布斯！快去找人帮忙！

translation.en: [man] There! There! There!
Come on, Basil!
[Pretty] Careful with his head.
[Pretty] Mr. Brown! Mr. Brown! Mr. Brown!
Mr. Brown?
-[Pretty] That's it. -[Jacobs] That's it.
-[Brown gasps] -Mr. Brown. Mr. Brown.
You're all right now. You're all right. You're all right.
[sighs, chuckles] You're all right.
Into the library, Grateley. Lay him on the sofa.
translation.zh:
‎把他带到书房 格莱特利
‎让他躺在沙发上

translation.en: [Pretty] Did you see something?
[Brown] See something?
When you were gone.
Something did come into my head.
translation.zh: ‎我脑海中确实浮现了某个画面

translation.en: What was it?
[clicks tongue] My, uh… my grandfather.
I have his name.
Basil Brown.
Farming man.
Taught me everything I know about Suffolk soil.
translation.zh:
‎所有关于萨福克土壤的知识
‎都是他传授给我的

translation.en: And you saw him?
[Brown] Oh, I saw nothing at all. I was just…
translation.zh: ‎我什么都没看见 我只是…

translation.en: I just thought of him. [sighs]
Well… perhaps he saw you. [chuckles softly]
-Excuse me. -Mr. Brown, are you all right?
translation.zh: ‎不好意思 ‎布朗先生 你没事吧？

translation.en: [Pretty] Mr. Brown!
Mr. Brown, you have to rest!
See, Mrs. Pretty… this one is the one you like.
translation.zh:
‎你看 普莱提太太  ‎这个你喜欢
‎并且想让我先着手的土墩

translation.en: It's the one you wanted me to start on. It's oval.
translation.zh:
‎这个你喜欢
‎并且想让我先着手的土墩 ‎它呈椭圆形

translation.en: Like a hog's back.
-See? All the others, circular. -Yes.
Now, this land's been plowed for 1,000 year.
translation.zh:
‎-是
‎-这片土地经历过长达千年的翻耕

translation.en: Now, supposing whoever plowed here…
translation.zh: ‎假设在这里进行翻耕的农民

translation.en: gradually knocked a bit off.
So, by the time robbers come along,
they'd have sunk the flute into what they thought was the center.
translation.zh:
‎他们将竖井挖在
‎他们以为是土墩中心的位置

translation.en: -[Pretty] But it might not have been. -[Brown] That's right.
East to west, that's my feeling.
translation.zh: ‎直觉告诉我 从东往西进行挖掘

translation.en: [chuckles] You say the word…
…and I'll dig.
[Robert] My plane crashed into the Arctic waste, you see.
translation.zh: ‎我的飞机坠毁在北极荒原上

translation.en: And when I woke up, 500 years had passed.
translation.zh: ‎当我醒来的时候 五百年已经过去了

translation.en: -So, now I'm stuck in the 25th century. -[Brown] What's that like, then?
translation.zh: ‎所以现在我被困在了二十五世纪 ‎那里什么情况啊？

translation.en: Well, the Earth is controlled by Killer Kane, who's an extremely evil man.
translation.zh:
‎地球被杀手凯恩掌控着
‎他是个极其邪恶的男人

translation.en: [Brown] Like Hitler?
[chuckles] Yes, with an even worse mustache.
translation.zh: ‎对 不过他留了更丑的胡子

translation.en: Did the people who made these burial mounds have mustaches?
translation.zh:
‎建造这些土墩墓的那些人
‎也留胡子吗？

translation.en: [Brown] And beards.
They were a very beardy lot.
Not like them there Romans. Now, they liked the close shave.
translation.zh:
‎罗马人就不同了
‎他们喜欢把脸刮得干干净净

translation.en: The Vikings and the space pilots are the same, really, aren't they?
translation.zh:
‎那么维京人和太空飞行员
‎其实是一样的呀

translation.en: They explore new lands and have battles in ships.
translation.zh:
‎他们都喜欢探索新土地
‎以及在舰上战斗

translation.en: Yeah, when you put it like that, I suppose they might be the same.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 你这么一说  ‎他们好像确实是一样的

translation.en: [Robert] They come over all the time. There's an RAF base nearby.
translation.zh:
‎他们经常飞过这里
‎这附近有个皇家空军基地

translation.en: Would you like to fly, Mr. Brown?
translation.zh: ‎你想在空中飞行吗 布朗先生？

translation.en: [Brown] Oh, but I do.
All over the cosmos, every time I look through my telescope.
translation.zh: ‎我的望远镜 ‎带我飞遍了整个宇宙

translation.en: You… You have a telescope?
-I do. -[Robert] Did you bring it with you?
[Brown] I did.
Well, will you show me?
I might.
Cor! He likes to natter, he does.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 那孩子还真是罗嗦

translation.en: What was all that about space travel?
[maid] Mr. Brown had an awful lot of books.
Came on his bike with a great parcel of them.
translation.zh:
‎他带着一大包裹的书
‎骑着自行车过来

translation.en: Sloan says some are in Norwegian.
translation.zh: ‎莱恩斯太太说一些还是挪威语书

translation.en: Shall we try the green silk?
-It's an old favorite, isn't it? -[Pretty] No.
The velvet with the lace.
[Grateley] Mrs. Lyons hopes it will agree.
translation.zh: ‎莱恩斯太太希望这不会引起不适

translation.en: [Pretty] How's your leg, Mr. Grateley?
translation.zh: ‎你的脚怎么样了 格莱特利先生？

translation.en: Oh, much better, ma'am. Thank you for inquiring.
translation.zh: ‎好多了 太太 谢谢关心

translation.en: Would you like the wireless? -[Pretty] Yes, please. -[clicks on]
translation.zh:
‎-要打开收音机吗？
‎-好的 谢谢

translation.en: [radio announcer] …the Air Guard under the age of 32
translation.zh: ‎…三十二岁以下的空军国民警卫队

translation.en: are now being asked to stand by
translation.zh: ‎被要求随时待命接受进一步培训

translation.en: for further training as RAF pilots or crew.
translation.zh: ‎被要求随时待命接受进一步培训 ‎成为皇家空军飞行员或机组人员

translation.en: [Mrs. Lyons] She's only been here 12 year.
-[Billy] Mm-hmm. -Came down from Cheshire.
Then she married the colonel.
He first met with Edith when she was still at school.
translation.zh: ‎他初遇伊迪丝的时候 她还是个学生

translation.en: And on his 17th birthday, he asked her to marry him.
translation.zh: ‎在她十七岁生日那天 他向她求婚了

translation.en: -She turned him down. -[Billy] Mm.
She say she can't possibly leave her father.
translation.zh: ‎她说她不能离开自己的父亲

translation.en: [Mrs. Lyons] She cared for her father another 13 year, until he died.
translation.zh: ‎之后的十三年 她一直照顾她的父亲  ‎直到他去世

translation.en: [Billy] After 13 years.
[Mrs. Lyons] She finally accepted the colonel's proposal.
He been asking every year on her birthday. [Billy] On her birthday.
translation.zh:
‎这十三年来
‎他每年都在她生日那天向她求婚

translation.en: [Mrs. Lyons] Just after they had Robert…
her husband went and died too.
[Mrs. Lyons] Imagine that.
[Brown] Do any of you want to look through this?
-[man] I thought we'd sit down on that. -[Brown] You have a go.
translation.zh:
‎-还以为你是想让我坐下呢
‎-换你试试

translation.en: That's right.
-[Jacobs] I'm gonna follow you back home. -[group laughing]
[Brown] Wait! Wait, for Christ's sake!
[Brown] Come on.
[Brown] Maynard! Maynard!
They found an iron rivet at the burial mound at Snape, didn't they?
translation.zh:
‎他们在位于斯内普的土墩墓里
‎找到了一颗铁铆钉 对吧？

translation.en: [Maynard] Snape? Basil, what have you found?
translation.zh: ‎斯内普？巴兹尔 你找到什么了？

translation.en: My goodness, Basil.
-[Spooner] Right. Any joy, Basil? -[Brown] Coming along together.
translation.zh:
‎-进展如何 巴兹尔？
‎-还不错

translation.en: Mr. Spooner, will you bring my tape measure from the hut?
translation.zh:
‎斯普纳先生
‎能帮我从小屋里拿出卷尺吗？

translation.en: One of you best get Mrs. Pretty down here.
translation.zh: ‎你们谁去把普莱提太太叫过来

translation.en: -[Jacobs] She's gone up to London. -She what? How long?
[Jacobs] London, with Robert. Couple of days.
translation.zh: ‎她和罗伯特一起去了伦敦 去几天

translation.en: [sighs] Blast.
Right, boys. Here we go. Come on together.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 孩子们 开工了

translation.en: Better have something to show Mrs. Pretty when she get back.
translation.zh:
‎在普莱提太太回来前
‎我们最好做出点成绩来

translation.en: -[knocking on door] -[Grateley] And the crystal glasses!
No, no, no. Side door, please.
-Mrs. Pretty back from London yet? -Mrs. Pretty's about to dine.
translation.zh:
‎普莱提太太从伦敦回来了吗？ ‎-普莱提太太正准备用餐
‎-我说了这是急事

translation.en: [Brown] I told you it was urgent.
translation.zh:
‎-普莱提太太正准备用餐
‎-我说了这是急事

translation.en: [Grateley] Mr. Brown, I'm sure you wouldn't like to interfere with--
translation.zh:
‎布朗先生 我相信
‎你也不想打扰到太太吃晚餐

translation.en: [Pretty] It's all right, Mr. Grateley.
-Is it Mr. Brown? -[Pretty] Yes, darling. Darling
translation.zh:
‎-那是布朗先生吗？
‎-是 ‎亲爱的 小心点

translation.en: I think you'd better come and see.
[Brown] That's a ship.
[Robert] How do you mean, a ship?
[Brown] Oh, well, that's a ship that's been buried in the mound.
translation.zh: ‎那是一艘被埋在土墩里的船

translation.en: [Robert] Why would anyone want to bury a ship?
translation.zh: ‎怎么会有人想把船埋起来呢？

translation.en: [Brown] Well, I expect because that's a grave.
[Robert] Whose grave?
[Brown] Well, I'd expect this is a grave of a… a great man.
A warrior…
or a king.
They must have pulled his ship all the way up that there hill from the river.
translation.zh: ‎他们一定是将他的船 ‎从那条河中拉到这片丘陵上

translation.en: Now, they'd have put it on ropes, and they'd have hauled it over logs.
translation.zh:
‎首先在船底垫起滚木
‎再用绳索拖着前進

translation.en: Men, horses. It must have taken hundreds of 'em. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎肯定动用了上百人力、上百匹马

translation.en: I don't expect them to go to all this trouble for any little squirt.
translation.zh:
‎他们可不会为了某个小人物
‎如此大费周章

translation.en: Can you imagine the send-off they'd be giving him?
translation.zh:
‎你能想象他们为他办了
‎多么隆重的葬礼吗？

translation.en: The songs they'd be singing. [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎为他唱了多么悲壮的挽歌吗？

translation.en: They'd have drunk Mr. Spooner under the table.
translation.zh:
‎他的白事酒宴
‎我看连斯普纳先生都会喝趴下

translation.en: -[Brown and Pretty laugh] -[Robert] Vikings?
[sniffles] Well, I… I think that's older.
Maynard disagrees, but I think it's Anglo-Saxon.
translation.zh:
‎梅纳德不认同
‎但我认为是盎格鲁-撒克逊人

translation.en: Now, this is your doing, John Jacobs, 'cause you found the first rivet.
translation.zh:
‎这都归功于你 约翰雅各布斯
‎因为你找到了第一颗铆钉

translation.en: -[Jacobs chuckles] -That's right, Mrs. Pretty. He did.
translation.zh: ‎没错 普莱提太太 他确实找到了

translation.en: Congratulations, Mr. Brown.
[Brown chuckles] Well, you thought there was something, didn't you? I had my feeling.
translation.zh:
‎-你不也觉得底下有东西了吗？
‎-我的确有预感

translation.en: That you did, Mrs. Pretty. That you did.
translation.zh: ‎的确啊 普莱提太太 的确

translation.en: [Pretty] Oh, John.
-Congratulations, Mr. Spooner. -[Spooner] Thank you, ma'am.
translation.zh:
‎-恭喜你 斯普纳先生
‎-谢谢你 太太

translation.en: [Brown] We couldn't have done it without this young man here.
[softly] Robert, a ship!
[Robert] Thank you. Mr. Brown.
[Brown] Well, there's a lot of earth to… to shift now.
But who knows?
I'm pretty sure it continues further.
translation.zh: ‎我很确定要努力的远不止于此

translation.en: [man] Evening.
Evening.
[Reid Moir] Do you realize what this means?
It's going to change everything for Ipswich.
translation.zh:
‎伊普斯威奇博物馆的未来
‎将会彻底改变

translation.en: We'll be the envy of every museum in the country.
translation.zh:
‎我们将成为
‎国内所有博物馆的眼红对象

translation.en: -You're gonna get wet, Mrs. Pretty. -[Pretty] I'm afraid I already am.
translation.zh:
‎-你会被雨淋湿的 普莱提太太
‎-我已经湿透了

translation.en: [Pretty] Mr. Reid Moir has kindly offered to take charge of the dig.
translation.zh:
‎摩尔先生非常慷慨地表示
‎愿意接手挖掘工程

translation.en: I turned his generous offer down.
-You didn't. -[Pretty] I did.
[chuckles, splutters] What did he say?
He said I couldn't keep it to myself, which is true.
translation.zh:
‎他说我不能将遗物占为己有
‎事实确实如此

translation.en: [chuckling] I bet he blew his gasket.
In the meantime, I've asked my cousin, Rory Lomax, to come.
translation.zh:
‎在此期间
‎我让我表弟罗伊洛马克斯过来了

translation.en: -[Brown] Right. -I can see you need another pair of hands.
He's only an amateur, but then, so is Mr. Reid Moir.
translation.zh:
‎他只是个门外汉
‎不过嘛 摩尔先生也是如此

translation.en: -Mrs. Pretty, you better go in the shed. -Oh, yes.
translation.zh:
‎-普莱提太太 还是去小屋里避雨吧
‎-哦 好

translation.en: -[Brown] You're gonna get very wet here. -[Pretty] I will.
[Pretty] I wanted to thank you for your patience with Robert.
translation.zh: ‎我想感谢你对罗伯特如此有耐心

translation.en: He can hardly wait to see you in the mornings.
translation.zh: ‎他每天早上都等不及想出来见你

translation.en: [Brown] Well, keeps me on me toes, having him around.
translation.zh: ‎有他在身边 我也不敢有丝毫懈怠

translation.en: Do you have children?
No, uh, we, uh…
No.
[Pretty] The servants tell me you've studied everything, from Latin to geology.
translation.zh:
‎仆人们告诉我
‎从拉丁语到地质学 你全都研究过

translation.en: [Brown] Well, a little education is a dangerous thing.
[Pretty] Hmm. Apparently, you've written a book. [Brown] I have.
A guide to astronomical maps and charts,
to make them accessible to ordinary men.
translation.zh: ‎以便其内容能为一般民众所理解

translation.en: [Brown] I left school when I was 12.
Always had a hunger to study.
[Pretty] I got a place at London University.
My father wouldn't hear of it.
Would you have dinner with me?
Well… thank you. Yes.
[Brown] Evening, Vera.
Surprise for you, Basil, in your room.
[Brown] Right.
May.
I brought you some fresh shirts.
-[Brown chuckles] -About time, I say.
-Are you pleased to see me? -Of course I am.
-You didn't know I was coming, did you? -[Brown] No. No, I didn't.
translation.zh:
‎-你不知道我要来吧？
‎-不 不知道

translation.en: I did tell you.
In my last letter.
[Brown] Oh, I was saving them for the weekend.
I've been working every hour. You know what I'm like. [chuckles]
translation.zh:
‎我每天夜以继日地工作
‎你也懂我的

translation.en: Yes… I do.
[Brown] I'm very busy.
-It looks like it. Nowhere to sit in here. -[Brown] There's a lot going on here.
translation.zh:
‎-看得出来 连坐的地方都没了
‎-有好多事要处理

translation.en: -What's that? -I said there's nowhere to sit down.
translation.zh:
‎-你说什么？
‎-我说这里连坐的地方都没了

translation.en: [Brown] Yeah. Sorry about that. It's all-- So much going on.
You got something to show me? I think you have. I can see it in your eyes.
translation.zh:
‎你有东西想让我看吧？
‎看你的眼神就知道了

translation.en: I'm not saying anything.
[maid] There's Mr. Brown with a woman.
translation.zh: ‎布朗先生和一个女人在一起呢

translation.en: I suppose it's his wife. You know, she writes to him every day.
translation.zh:
‎那应该是他的妻子
‎她天天都给他写信呢

translation.en: Come in.
Mr. Brown sends his apologies, ma'am.
translation.zh: ‎太太 布朗先生让我代他向你道歉

translation.en: That's all. Thank you, Ellen. [sighs]
translation.zh: ‎可以了 谢谢你 艾伦

translation.en: [Brown] A man could dig the earth his whole life through
translation.zh: ‎有些人这辈子就算再拼命挖

translation.en: and not find anything like I've discovered here.
-[May] She's beautiful, all right. -[Brown] Yeah, she's beautiful.
[May] You'll have to watch your back with a thing like this.
translation.zh: ‎手上有这种宝贝 你得当心点才行

translation.en: [Brown] What do you mean?
[May] Everyone's gonna want a piece of this here ship, and this is your find.
translation.zh:
‎大家肯定都会想分一杯羹 ‎-但这是你的发现
‎-梅

translation.en: [Brown] Oh, May…
[May] Don't let Ipswich Museum take your glory.
translation.zh: ‎别让伊普斯威奇博物馆抢走你的功劳

translation.en: -[Brown] He's not gonna take-- -[May] Or that lady at the manor.
translation.zh:
‎-他不会…
‎-还有这个庄园的女主人

translation.en: -She should be upping your wages again. -[Brown] She's supportive.
translation.zh:
‎-她该给你涨工资了 你问过没？
‎-她非常支持我

translation.en: -[May] You asked? -[Brown] I ain't gonna ask for more.
[Brown] Well, she's very, very gracious, Mrs. Pretty.
translation.zh: ‎普莱提太太她已经很慷慨了

translation.en: [May] Your heart's lost to this Viking maiden, I can tell.
translation.zh:
‎这艘维京长船
‎已经俘获了你的心 对吧？

translation.en: [Brown] Ah, May, you sure you don't want to stay the night?
translation.zh: ‎梅 你确定不要留下来过夜吗？

translation.en: I'll miss my lift back.
[Brown] Right, yeah, um…
Well, thanks for coming, May.
[sighs] I do miss you.
-I've been reading your books for company. -You haven't.
translation.zh:
‎我都在看你的书 好让自己有个伴儿 ‎-你骗人
‎-真的

translation.en: -[May] I have. -[scoffs]
[laughing] Hell, it's not much company, is it?
translation.zh: ‎天哪 那不是什么好伴儿吧？

translation.en: -[May] No, they're hard work, I tell you. -They are.
Right. Well, it's good of you to bring my shirts.
All right.
[Brown] I'll read them letters tonight.
-[May] Bye, then. -[Brown] Bye.
Blast!
-Let me help. -[Brown] Right.
Right, then. Get around that side and take this tarp.
translation.zh:
‎-让我来帮你
‎-好吧 ‎绕过去那边 把油布拉过去

translation.en: That's… That's right. That's right. There's a stake there behind you.
Pull it hard.
[Brown] Where in God's name did you come from?
[young man] I rode, actually, on my motorbike from Ipswich. [sniffles]
translation.zh:
‎我从伊普斯威奇博物馆
‎骑摩托车过来的

translation.en: I'm Rory Lomax.
[Brown] Aye. Did Reid Moir send you?
-From the museum? -[thunder rumbles]
I'm Edith Pretty's cousin.
She telephoned, asked me to come. -Said you needed an extra pair of hands. -All right.
translation.zh:
‎她给我打了电话让我过来
‎说你需要帮手

translation.en: I pointed out my general lack of skill, but she was undeterred.
translation.zh:
‎我还强调了自己技能不足
‎但她并没有因此而动摇

translation.en: Right. Well…
no doubt you'll hear that my name is Brown. Basil Brown.
translation.zh:
‎那你肯定也听说了我名字叫布朗 ‎-巴兹尔布朗
‎-幸会

translation.en: [Rory] Good to meet you.
[Brown] Now, it's gonna be raining for a while, so go on and take a seat. [sniffles]
translation.zh: ‎这场雨怕是要下一阵子了 先坐下吧

translation.en: I expect you'd, uh, be wet, coming from Ipswich on a motorbike.
translation.zh:
‎从博物馆骑摩托车过来
‎应该全身都湿透了吧？

translation.en: -[Rory] I was, rather. -[Brown] Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎也还好 开始下雨时我也正好赶到了

translation.en: -[Rory] Just caught me at the end. -[Brown] Right.
translation.zh: ‎也还好 开始下雨时我也正好赶到了 ‎好 我去生个炉子

translation.en: Well, I'll light the stove. Would you like some tea?
translation.zh:
‎好 我去生个炉子  ‎-要喝茶吗？
‎-好啊 谢谢

translation.en: [Rory chuckles] Yes, please.
[Brown] I think we may have found, um, an old, uh, Anglo-Saxon ship.
translation.zh:
‎我认为我们可能找到了
‎一艘盎格鲁-撒克逊时期的战船

translation.en: When this rain clears tomorrow, maybe you can see what we're doing.
translation.zh:
‎等明天雨停了
‎带你去看看我们在做什么吧

translation.en: -Yeah? -How very exciting.
Yeah, it's all right.
-[Jacobs] Not gonna cover it. -[Brown] Get the second tarp.
-Pass me the hammer, please. -[Jacobs] Right.
[Spooner] All right, then.
[Brown] Lift up.
-[panting] -[Brown] That's right.
Rory!
Hello, Spud.
[grunts] Arrived in the night. Didn't want to wake you. Where's your mother?
translation.zh:
‎我昨晚半夜到的
‎不想吵醒你 你母亲呢？

translation.en: -[steam engine approaching] -[Robert] Oh, she's gone to London.
[man] Who knows if we'll still be alive in a year?
translation.zh: ‎谁知道一年后我们是否还活着？

translation.en: [announcer on loudspeaker] The yellow and green balls denote gas.
translation.zh: ‎黄色和绿色的球代表毒气弹

translation.en: -Red denotes high explosives. -[children laughing]
[announcer] Red stripes are incendiary bombs.
If you are caught on the streets during an air raid,
translation.zh: ‎如果空袭发生时你正好在大街上

translation.en: you must know the appropriate response to each form of attack.
translation.zh: ‎你必须知道如何适当地应对各项攻击

translation.en: No, don't throw them about!
[Pretty] I was rushing to get here on time.
Might that have affected the results?
[doctor] Possibly, but the, uh, underlying condition is there.
translation.zh: ‎有可能 但潜在的疾病仍然存在

translation.en: The rheumatic fever you had as a child, it, uh, damaged the valves of your heart.
translation.zh:
‎你小时候患过风湿热
‎导致你的心脏瓣膜受到损害

translation.en: Irreparably, I'm afraid.
Another attack is likely to be much… more serious.
translation.zh: ‎再次发作的话 情况可能会更严重

translation.en: Possibly even fatal.
-Is there nothing else that can be done? -[doctor] I'm sorry. I… I… I wish I had better news.
translation.zh:
‎-就没有其他办法了吗？
‎-抱歉 我也希望能告诉你好消息

translation.en: [Grateley] Mr. Reid Moir is here, ma'am, with some other gentlemen.
translation.zh:
‎里德摩尔先生过来了
‎还带着几位先生

translation.en: They wouldn't stop to give me their names.
translation.zh: ‎他们不肯停下来告诉我名字

translation.en: Then they're trespassing. Where are they?
translation.zh: ‎那就是私闯民宅了 他们在哪？

translation.en: -On their way to the mounds. -Fetch them, quickly.
translation.zh:
‎-正在前往土墩
‎-快去把他们追回来

translation.en: -Right. -[Pretty] Lyons?
translation.zh:
‎-正在前往土墩
‎-快去把他们追回来 ‎莱恩斯？

translation.en: [Brown] Now, I've been reading up about the Oseberg Ship.
translation.zh: ‎我最近一直在研究奥塞格号

translation.en: That's a Viking ship they found in Norway.
translation.zh: ‎那是一艘在挪威发现的维京船

translation.en: There was a burial chamber in the center, roofed.
It's a bit like we imagine Noah's Ark.
translation.zh: ‎跟我们想象中的诺亚方舟有点像

translation.en: Course, any roof here would have caved in long ago.
translation.zh: ‎当然 这艘船的甲板早已经塌陷了

translation.en: See, this line here.
The ground is higher, but this soil is darker.
translation.zh: ‎这地面较高 但土壤颜色较暗

translation.en: So you think there's something beneath?
Well, we may know by the end of today.
translation.zh: ‎今天结束前我们也许就会知道了

translation.en: Ye gods!
This is incredible!
[Reid Moir] We at the Ipswich Museum pride ourselves on our work,
translation.zh:
‎我们伊普斯威奇博物馆
‎对我们的工作感到无比自豪

translation.en: and I… I think you'll agree that it's rock solid.
translation.zh: ‎我想你也会同意 我们做得非常出色

translation.en: -[Brown] You… You need to stop there. -I beg your pardon?
translation.zh:
‎请你止步 ‎-你说什么？
‎-此遗址极其脆弱 而且不安全

translation.en: This is a very delicate site, and it ain't safe.
translation.zh:
‎-你说什么？
‎-此遗址极其脆弱 而且不安全

translation.en: Uh, not for a man of your size.
Is this your work?
Uh, yes. I'm Basil Brown, excavator.
translation.zh: ‎对 我是挖掘专家 巴兹尔布朗

translation.en: [clears throat] Well, Basil Brown, excavator…
translation.zh: ‎我说 挖掘专家 巴兹尔布朗

translation.en: I am Charles Phillips, archaeologist,
translation.zh: ‎我是考古学家 查尔斯菲利普斯

translation.en: and I'm here to tell you that,
as this is a find of national interest,
translation.zh: ‎由于此项考古发现涉及国家利益

translation.en: the British Museum will be taking charge.
translation.zh: ‎其挖掘工程将由大英博物馆负责

translation.en: Your work…
looks, thankfully, decent,
translation.zh: ‎看起来还算不错 谢天谢地

translation.en: but your excavating service is no longer required.
translation.zh: ‎但这里已不再需要你的挖掘服务

translation.en: Am… Am I to understand that you will be personally taking over?
translation.zh:
‎我没理解错的话
‎你是要亲自接管这项工程吗？

translation.en: Grimes, I have never seen anything like it.
translation.zh:
‎葛莱姆斯
‎我从未见过如此壮丽的遗址

translation.en: -Quite, sir. -Brailesford.
translation.zh:
‎确实啊 大人 ‎-布雷斯福德
‎-是

translation.en: -Sir. -[Phillips] Cancel everything I've got.
translation.zh:
‎-布雷斯福德
‎-是 ‎取消我所有的行程

translation.en: Find out who's free. We need Piggott.
translation.zh: ‎查一下谁有空 我们需要皮戈特

translation.en: -Find us lodgings, as near as you can. -[Brailesford] Yes, sir.
translation.zh:
‎-给我们找住宿 越近越好
‎-是 大人

translation.en: [Reid Moir] That dark soil in the middle, C.W., looks very promising.
translation.zh:
‎中间那片颜色较暗的土壤
‎看起来很有盼头

translation.en: You men, finish up, and don't move another pebble!
translation.zh: ‎你们赶紧收工 别再碰一粒沙子

translation.en: [Brown] Excuse me, Mr. Phillips.
translation.zh: ‎不好意思 菲利普斯先生

translation.en: [splutters] I'm not employed by you.
I'm employed by Mrs. Pretty,
and I'll keep on working until she tells me different.
translation.zh: ‎除非她让我停工 否则我将继续工作

translation.en: An ad hoc team from a provincial museum cannot be left in charge.
translation.zh:
‎这项工程不能交给
‎一支省博物馆的特设小组负责

translation.en: Mrs. Pretty must see that.
John, a minute is all I need. I… I know she'll want to hear this.
translation.zh:
‎约翰 我只需要一分钟
‎她会想听听这个消息的

translation.en: -All right, all right. Wait here. -Right.
[Grateley] She'll see you tomorrow morning at 10:30. She must know what I found.
translation.zh:
‎-她明早十点半见你
‎-不 她必须知道我发现了什么

translation.en: -[Grateley] Don't push it, old boy! -[Brown] She must know!
translation.zh:
‎-别得寸进尺了
‎-她必须知道我发现了什么

translation.en: -[slams] -[Brown] John!
-Is he gone, Mr. Grateley? -[Brown] It's not Grateley.
translation.zh: ‎他走了吗 格莱特利先生？ ‎我不是格莱特利先生

translation.en: I… I'm sorry for disturbing you, but I believe…
translation.zh: ‎很抱歉打扰你 但我相信

translation.en: we may have found a burial chamber in the ship.
translation.zh: ‎我们在船里找到了一个墓室

translation.en: -Does Mr. Phillips know? -[Brown] I don't work for Mr. Phillips.
translation.zh:
‎-菲利普斯先生知道吗？
‎-我不效力于菲利普斯先生

translation.en: What are your wishes?
I, uh… He just informed me that, by order of the Ministry of Works,
translation.zh: ‎他刚刚通知我 根据工程部的命令

translation.en: the site must be placed under his control.
translation.zh: ‎该遗址必须置于他的管制之下

translation.en: Well, uh… [sighs]
…that's that, then.
[Brown, muffled] Well, I… I can carry on for one more day… if that's what you'd like.
translation.zh:
‎如果你想要的话
‎我能再继续工作一天

translation.en: Are… Are you poorly, Mrs. Pretty?
Perhaps you might, um…
might ring the bell for me.
Right.
He's got no right to dictate to you.
This ship's only appearing because of you.
translation.zh: ‎能找到这艘船 都是多亏了你

translation.en: Don't forget why you wanted it begun.
translation.zh: ‎别忘了你当初为什么要让我开始挖掘

translation.en: Now, you said that was a feeling. Your feeling is right.
translation.zh: ‎你说你有预感 你的预感是对的

translation.en: -Mr. Brown seems to have found his way in. -[Grateley] Mr. Brown.
translation.zh: ‎布朗先生溜进屋里了 ‎布朗先生

translation.en: All right.
[Grateley] Is there anything I could bring you?
Fetch Ellen for me, please.
[Phillips] Mrs. Pretty is keen to keep you on,
translation.zh: ‎普莱提太太坚持要留住你们

translation.en: so we'll make good use of you.
translation.zh: ‎所以呢 我们会善加利用你们的

translation.en: Your primary task will be to keep the site in order.
translation.zh: ‎你们的主要任务是保持场地整洁有序

translation.en: So, I want the tumulus dug back to an area of four feet on either side,
translation.zh: ‎我要你们将土墩向两侧挖开1.2米

translation.en: and I want those spoil heaps removed.
translation.zh: ‎然后再把那些弃土堆清除掉

translation.en: From now on,
translation.zh: ‎从现在开始 未经我的明示许可

translation.en: you're not to set foot in the body of the ship without my express permission.
translation.zh: ‎从现在开始 未经我的明示许可 ‎不得涉足船体

translation.en: Carry on.
[Jacobs] Are you gonna put up with that, Basil?
translation.zh: ‎你打算容忍下去吗 巴兹尔？

translation.en: [Robert] Hello, Mr. Brown.
-My mother's got her heartburn. -Oh, I'm sorry to hear that.
translation.zh: ‎我母亲的胃灼热又发作了 ‎很遗憾听到这消息

translation.en: She has to have peace and quiet. I made her this.
translation.zh:
‎她需要清净 ‎-我给她弄了这个
‎-这火箭做得还真不错

translation.en: -[Brown] Well, that's a very fine rocket. -Where are you going?
translation.zh:
‎-我给她弄了这个
‎-这火箭做得还真不错 ‎你要去哪啊？

translation.en: Oh, I… Oh, I have to go home now.
When will you be back?
Well, uh… I'm sorry, Robert. I…
I am.
Uh, but, Mr. Brown…
Mr. Brown!
-Mr. Brown! -[Rory] It seems I'm out of a job.
[Rory] Phillips won't let us in his ship.
translation.zh: ‎菲利普斯不让我们碰他的船

translation.en: His ship? Really?
I thought I might take some photographs. It could make a useful record.
translation.zh:
‎我想拍些照片留作记录
‎也许用得上 你介意吗？

translation.en: -Would you mind? -Not at all.
translation.zh:
‎我想拍些照片留作记录
‎也许用得上 你介意吗？ ‎完全不介意 别拍我就行

translation.en: -As long as they're not of me. -[camera clicks]
translation.zh: ‎完全不介意 别拍我就行

translation.en: Can't say I blame Brown.
translation.zh: ‎我得说 我不怪布朗 这么一个好男人

translation.en: Such a decent man doesn't deserve Phillips.
translation.zh: ‎我得说 我不怪布朗 这么一个好男人 ‎不该被菲利普斯糟蹋

translation.en: Blame him?
Well, he left this morning. Didn't you know?
translation.zh: ‎他今早离开了 你不知道吗？

translation.en: Where's Robert?
You don't have another job?
I'll write to Maynard, and he'll give me something.
translation.zh:
‎我会写信给梅纳德
‎他会给我安排点什么的

translation.en: [May] Did you tell Mrs. Pretty you were leaving?
translation.zh: ‎你有跟普莱提太太说你要离开吗？

translation.en: [Brown] I thought I'd let her work it out herself.
And that's the thanks she gets for giving you the opportunity in the first place?
translation.zh:
‎她当初给了你这个机会
‎你是这样答谢人家的吗？

translation.en: Mark my words, May, I won't receive any credit.
translation.zh: ‎记住我的话 梅 我分不到半点功劳

translation.en: -I won't even be a footnote. -[May] Is that why you took the job?
translation.zh:
‎甚至连名字都不会被提及 ‎-你接这活儿就是为了功劳？
‎-我总不能留下当苦工啊

translation.en: -For credit? -How can I stay on?
translation.zh:
‎-你接这活儿就是为了功劳？
‎-我总不能留下当苦工啊

translation.en: Is that why you've been digging your whole life for barely enough
translation.zh:
‎-你接这活儿就是为了功劳？
‎-我总不能留下当苦工啊 ‎你一生挖土 赚那么一丁点钱
‎为的就是功劳？

translation.en: to cover our rent?
translation.zh:
‎你一生挖土 赚那么一丁点钱
‎为的就是功劳？

translation.en: No, May. I do it 'cause I'm good at it.
translation.zh:
‎不 梅 我这么做
‎是因为我在这方面非常出色

translation.en: 'Cause that's what my father taught me, and what his father taught him.
translation.zh:
‎是因为这是我爷爷传授予我父亲
‎再由父亲传授于我的

translation.en: 'Cause you can show me a handful of soil from anywhere in Suffolk,
translation.zh: ‎是因为你在萨福克郡随手抓一把土壤

translation.en: and I can pretty much tell you whose land it's from.
translation.zh: ‎我都能告诉你那来自谁家的土地

translation.en: There you go.
[Robert] Excuse me. Do you know Basil Brown?
-Do you know where he lives? -Yes, I know Basil.
translation.zh:
‎-你知道他住哪吗？
‎-是 我认识巴兹尔

translation.en: He lives on a farm outside of the village. Carry on that way.
translation.zh: ‎他住在村外的农场里 往那边走

translation.en: Thank you so much.
I found that ship.
I may not be a fellow at Cambridge, but I worked out what was down there.
translation.zh:
‎我不是什么剑桥大学的研究员
‎但我琢磨出了底下埋着的是什么

translation.en: And Jacobs and Spooner, too, and nobody'll remember that.
translation.zh:
‎雅各布斯和斯普纳也有贡献
‎但没人会记得这一点

translation.en: You don't know that.
And if you're not around to see it to the end, there's even less chance.
translation.zh:
‎但你如果不坚持到底
‎那机会就更渺茫了

translation.en: You always told me your work isn't about the past or even the present.
translation.zh:
‎你总是告诉我
‎你的工作关乎的不是过去或现在

translation.en: It's for the future.
So that the next generations can know where they came from.
translation.zh:
‎是为了让后世子孙
‎能够知道自己来自何处

translation.en: The line that joins them to their forebears. Isn't that what you always say?
translation.zh:
‎是将祖先和后代联系起来的纽带
‎你不总是这么说吗？

translation.en: Yeah, something like that.
[May] Why else would the lot of you be playing in the dirt
translation.zh:
‎否则的话
‎整个国家都在为战争做准备

translation.en: while the rest of the country prepares for war?
translation.zh: ‎你们怎么还会有闲情挖土呢？

translation.en: -Because that means something, innit? -[Brown sighs]
translation.zh: ‎因为那有着重大意义 对吧？

translation.en: Something that'll last longer than whatever damn war we're heading into.
translation.zh:
‎不同于眼前这场该死的战争
‎那份意义将永世长存

translation.en: Good hell.
That's Robert.
-Robert? -[Robert panting]
-[bicycle brakes squeak] -Robert!
[Robert] Mr. Brown!
[Brown] Robert, have you cycled all this way?
translation.zh: ‎罗伯特 你这样一路骑过来了吗？

translation.en: You promised.
May! May!
You said you'd show me the cosmos. You promised.
translation.zh:
‎你说过要让我看宇宙的
‎你答应过我的

translation.en: -Good heavens! Who have we here? -[Brown] This is Robert Pretty.
translation.zh:
‎-天哪 这是谁呢？
‎-这是罗伯特普莱提

translation.en: [May] Robert, I'm Mrs. Brown.
I bet you have a rare thirst after that long ride, don't you?
translation.zh: ‎你骑了那么久的车 一定口渴了吧？

translation.en: -[Robert] Mm-hmm. -Come you here.
translation.zh: ‎你骑了那么久的车 一定口渴了吧？ ‎过来吧

translation.en: -Let's get you a cup of milk. -[Brown] That's a long way.
translation.zh:
‎-那么大老远骑车过来
‎-进去喝杯牛奶

translation.en: Does your mother know you're here, Robert?
-[May] How'd you find your way? -She know you cycled?
translation.zh:
‎-你怎么找到这里的？
‎-她知道你骑车过来吗？

translation.en: -[May] Should I take your bike for you? -[Robert] Yes, please.
translation.zh:
‎-我来帮你扶着自行车吧
‎-给他弄点火腿 梅

translation.en: I better find a telephone, May. Call Mrs. Pretty.
translation.zh: ‎我得去给普莱提太太打个电话

translation.en: -[Pretty] Thank you. -[Brown] He's all right.
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢你
‎-他没事 普莱提太太 他在屋里

translation.en: -He's inside. Uh, come this way. -[Pretty] Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢你
‎-他没事 普莱提太太 他在屋里 ‎-跟我来
‎-谢谢你

translation.en: -We were obviously very worried. -Yes. He's… He's…
Uh, this is May, my wife.
-Mrs. Pretty. -Thank you very much.
He's been no trouble. A lovely boy.
translation.zh: ‎他没给我们添麻烦 真是个好孩子

translation.en: Mrs. Brown has a music box from Whitby
translation.zh: ‎布朗太太有个来自惠特比的音乐盒

translation.en: covered in all manner of shells.
translation.zh: ‎上面缀满了各种各样的贝壳

translation.en: Would you like to see?
Uh, no. We've imposed on your kindness enough.
translation.zh: ‎不 我们给人家添的麻烦已经够多了

translation.en: What were you thinking?
You could have been lost or killed.
-Robert… what were you thinking? -[Robert] I'm sorry, Mother.
translation.zh:
‎罗伯特 ‎-你当时在想什么呢？
‎-母亲 对不起

translation.en: Uh, Robert came to remind me of a promise that I made.
translation.zh:
‎罗伯特是过来提醒我
‎我答应过他的一件事

translation.en: I said I'd show him the stars through my telescope.
translation.zh: ‎我说过要带他用望远镜看星星的

translation.en: Didn't I?
Then you're returning?
I am. Yes.
Thank you. [sighs]
[Rory] Morning!
[Brown] Morning.
Mr. Grimes. I've been, uh… taking notes.
translation.zh: ‎葛莱姆斯先生 我一直都有做笔记

translation.en: -Ah! -If they be of any use.
Why, they'd save me days.
translation.zh: ‎这会帮我省下好几天的时间

translation.en: -You must have suspected what was here. -[Brown] Well, you've made good progress.
translation.zh:
‎-你一定早就料到这里埋着什么
‎-你的进展也不错

translation.en: [Grimes] As did you.
Thank you kindly.
-[Grimes] It's fine work, Mr. Brown. -[Brown] Yeah. Well, we made a start.
translation.zh: ‎做得相当出色 布朗先生 ‎也算是个开始吧

translation.en: -Phillips. -[Phillips] Our excavator has returned.
translation.zh:
‎-菲利普斯
‎-我们的挖掘专家回来了

translation.en: [Brown] Morning.
[Phillips] There's a sign in the bottom of the ship that there could be an intact chamber.
translation.zh:
‎有迹象表明
‎船底可能有一座完整的墓室

translation.en: [Piggott] Tremendously exciting.
[Piggott] What about events in the wider world, C.W.?
translation.zh: ‎外面的世界正在发生的事呢 小查？

translation.en: How do you think it will affect us?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得会对我们有什么影响？

translation.en: [Phillips] Judging by last night's news…
I think we could be at war in a matter of weeks,
translation.zh: ‎我觉得战争可能会在几周内爆发

translation.en: and every excavation in the land will stop.
translation.zh: ‎而国内所有挖掘工程都会被迫停止

translation.en: -So, it's up to us. [clears throat] -[Piggott sighs]
-Oh, good lord. [gasps] -Gosh.
-[Piggott] Jim! Billy Grimes! -Stuart!
translation.zh:
‎吉姆！比利葛莱姆斯！ ‎-斯图尔特！
‎-近来可好啊？

translation.en: -How the devil are you? -[Piggott chuckles] Very well.
translation.zh:
‎-斯图尔特！
‎-近来可好啊？ ‎好极了 这是我妻子 玛格丽特

translation.en: -This is my wife, Margaret. -Peggy.
translation.zh:
‎好极了 这是我妻子 玛格丽特 ‎-是佩吉
‎-幸会 皮戈特太太

translation.en: [Brailesford] Mrs. Piggott, a pleasure to meet you.
translation.zh:
‎-是佩吉
‎-幸会 皮戈特太太

translation.en: [Peggy] Mr. Phillips, I-- um, I wanted to say how pleased I was
translation.zh:
‎菲利普斯先生 我只是想说 ‎你特别指定要我过来
‎我感到万分荣幸

translation.en: that you specifically asked for me to come.
translation.zh:
‎你特别指定要我过来
‎我感到万分荣幸

translation.en: I know Stuart sent you my paper on Bosnian Lake villagers.
translation.zh:
‎我知道斯图尔特给你寄了
‎我写的波斯尼亚湖村民论文

translation.en: It was awfully good of you to read it.
Ah, yes. Um, very stimulating.
translation.zh: ‎哦 对 非常引人入胜

translation.en: [Peggy chuckles] I hope I'll be able to repay your faith in me. [Phillips] I have no doubt.
translation.zh:
‎-我希望我不会让你失望
‎-对此我毫不怀疑

translation.en: It's just that I haven't done much actual fieldwork yet.
translation.zh:
‎只是我并没参与过
‎很多实地的考古工作

translation.en: Uh, so I wouldn't want you to think I'm more experienced than I really am.
translation.zh:
‎所以我不想让你认为
‎我比实际上更有经验

translation.en: [Phillips] Ah, you have all the key attributes.
[Peggy] Do I?
-This ship is very delicate. -[Peggy] Mm-hmm.
One could say, it, um, scarcely exists at all.
Too much weight, it disintegrates.
translation.zh: ‎施加太多的重量 它会崩解

translation.en: You're probably less than nine stone, so I'll supervise from here
translation.zh:
‎你体重应该不到六十公斤 所以呢 ‎你们这些身子轻盈的就负责挖掘
‎而我在这里监督就好

translation.en: while you light things get on with the digging.
translation.zh:
‎你们这些身子轻盈的就负责挖掘
‎而我在这里监督就好

translation.en: Am I to understand you only asked for me because of my size?
translation.zh:
‎所以你要求我过来
‎纯粹是因为我的体型吗？

translation.en: Uh, lucky guess, actually.
[chuckles] Yeah, thank God Piggott didn't marry a piglet.
translation.zh:
‎没错 谢天谢地
‎皮戈特娶的不是个胖妞

translation.en: [Phillips] Carry on!
-[Phillips] How does it look to you? -[Brailesford] Sir?
translation.zh:
‎-布雷斯福德
‎-是 大人 ‎你觉得怎么样？

translation.en: [Phillips] What have you got there?
[Brailesford] All right, then.
-[Piggott] First round's on me, chaps! -[Phillips] Very nice of you.
translation.zh:
‎-第一轮我请客 伙子们
‎-那就谢谢你了

translation.en: [coughs] Do they not have a… a double?
[Piggott] Sorry, darling, no. This is fine, though, isn't it?
translation.zh: ‎没有 亲爱的 不过这也不错 对吧？

translation.en: We don't… We don't want to start by making a fuss.
Oh, no. Of course not.
We're so lucky to be part of this. [sighs]
translation.zh: ‎能参与这项工程 我们是何等幸运

translation.en: [Peggy] Yes.
-[exhales] Yes, it's going to be amazing. -Mm.
Would you prefer this bed…
or… or… or that one?
I'll… I'll take this one, shall I?
[Brown] You need to find a star and identify its direction of travel.
translation.zh:
‎你必须找到一颗星星
‎并辨别其行进方向

translation.en: -Good evening, gentlemen. -[Brown] Good evening, Mrs. Pretty.
translation.zh:
‎-晚上好 绅士们
‎-晚上好 普莱提太太

translation.en: -Hello, Mother. -[Pretty] Hello, darling.
translation.zh: ‎你好 母亲 ‎你好 亲爱的

translation.en: [Robert] Do space pilots navigate using the stars?
translation.zh: ‎太空飞行员也利用星星导航吗？

translation.en: [Brown] Oh, most certainly, they do.
Ten more minutes, Commander. Then, bed.
translation.zh: ‎再给你十分钟 指挥官 然后去睡觉

translation.en: [Robert] I see a star.
-Oh, God! -[Phillips] What's going on?
-[Peggy] It just gave way. -[Phillips] Get her off there!
translation.zh:
‎-别动
‎-突然塌下去了 ‎快把她弄上来！

translation.en: -Piggott, get her off! -Oh, I'm so sorry!
translation.zh:
‎皮戈特 快把她弄上来！ ‎非常抱歉
‎我不是故意要破坏任何东西的

translation.en: -I didn't mean to damage anything. -[Piggott sighs] Oh, you…
translation.zh:
‎非常抱歉
‎我不是故意要破坏任何东西的

translation.en: -What you got, Brailesford? -[Brown] You all right?
translation.zh:
‎-有什么发现 布雷斯福德？
‎-你没事吧？

translation.en: [Brailesford] Sort of rusted lumps.
[Phillips] Come on, man. Where's your training?
[Brailesford] Uh, an amorphous mass of corroded objects, sir.
translation.zh: ‎一堆已腐蚀的无定形块状物 大人

translation.en: You, get your camera down there. Photograph it.
translation.zh: ‎你 拿着相机下去把它拍下来

translation.en: That's… That's very hot in the full sun.
translation.zh: ‎这么大的太阳 你一定很热吧

translation.en: Oh, I'm fine. Thank you.
Watch your step there. This could well be our chamber.
translation.zh: ‎小心脚下 这很可能就是我们的墓室

translation.en: [Pretty] Some barley water, Mrs. Piggott?
translation.zh: ‎喝点大麦茶吧 皮戈特太太

translation.en: -[sighs] Thank you. So clumsy. -[Pretty] Oh, not at all.
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢 我真是笨手笨脚
‎-不会 没这回事

translation.en: -That's a very lovely skirt. -[Peggy] Oh.
[chuckles] Completely useless. I don't have anything more suitable.
translation.zh:
‎根本毫无用处
‎我没有更合适的衣服了

translation.en: -We came straight from our holiday. -Did you really?
translation.zh:
‎-我们度完假直接过来的
‎-真的吗？

translation.en: -[Peggy chuckles] Yes. -[Pretty] Well, come to the house.
Let's see what we can find.
Is Mrs. Pretty still poorly?
She says she's perfectly fine, but…
[whispering] …that's typical of her.
Damn this weather.
Losing a whole day.
So little time before world events…
translation.zh: ‎战争很快就会爆发 让国家陷入混乱

translation.en: confound us.
[Phillips] It's a race, an absolute race.
translation.zh: ‎这绝对是一场和时间的赛跑

translation.en: [Pretty] Then you are wasting the talents of Mr. Brown.
translation.zh: ‎那你就是在浪费布朗先生的才华

translation.en: Well, that's an excellent idea.
Stuart couldn't fault his work. Could he not be unearthing the stern?
translation.zh:
‎斯图尔特对他的工作无可挑剔
‎就不能让他挖掘船尾吗？

translation.en: [Phillips] Mr. Brown isn't qualified.
Well, that's just snobbery, isn't it, Mr. Phillips?
translation.zh: ‎你这只是势利眼吧 菲利普斯先生？

translation.en: -[Phillips] Brown! -[Peggy clears throat]
[Phillips] Brown!
Brown, come here, man!
[Piggott gasps] Oh my God, Margaret.
Sorry. I forgot to lock the door.
[chuckles] No, you see, we… we… we share that bathroom
translation.zh:
‎你必须明白
‎我们和其他四间房共用一个浴室

translation.en: with… with four other rooms, and, you know, I could have been anyone.
translation.zh:
‎你必须明白
‎我们和其他四间房共用一个浴室 ‎刚才开门的可以是任何人

translation.en: -Um, I could've been Grimes or Phillips. -[Peggy scoffs]
translation.zh: ‎可以是葛莱姆斯 或者菲利普斯

translation.en: But you're not. You're my husband.
translation.zh: ‎但开门的是你 我的丈夫

translation.en: [chuckles] Yes, but how… how do you think I'd feel if… if one of them saw you in that state?
translation.zh:
‎是 但如果被他们看到你那副样子
‎你觉得我会有何感受？

translation.en: [scoffs] Oh! In what state?
[giggles] In this state?
Christ, I-- Stop. You should be more careful. It's…
translation.zh: ‎天哪 别闹了 你应该更小心点才是

translation.en: You know, now, after… after waiting eons, I shall… I shall go and have my bath.
translation.zh:
‎等了那么久
‎我现在终于可以去洗个澡了

translation.en: -[Grimes] Mr. Spooner. -[Spooner] Right.
-Morning, Mr. Piggott. -[chuckles nervously] C.W.
translation.zh:
‎-早安啊 皮戈特先生
‎-早 小查

translation.en: -[whispers] You might have woken me. -I didn't like to.
translation.zh: ‎你应该叫醒我的 ‎我不想吵醒你

translation.en: You made me appear late.
[Piggott whispering] Careful, Stuart. You've got a delicate line now, man.
translation.zh: ‎小心点 斯图尔特 那是很脆弱的缆索

translation.en: -Yeah. -[Phillips] Just a moment.
You have to be very careful now. No cavalier lifting.
-[Phillips] Very gently. -Yes, sir.
[Phillips] On my count. One, two, three.
translation.zh: ‎听我口令 一 二 三

translation.en: [softly] And we do it this way.
[Rory] Don't move.
-[Peggy breathing shakily] -[Brailesford] Piggott, look.
[Piggott] Where did you find it, darling? You clever girl.
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 你在哪找到的？ ‎你这聪明的姑娘

translation.en: Phillips!
-Look at this, sir. -Look. Look!
translation.zh:
‎-看看这个 大人
‎-你看 ‎你们看

translation.en: -[Phillips] Ah, good Lord. -[Piggott] His face!
Phillips.
-Mrs. Pretty, there's more. -[Brown] And here. And here too.
translation.zh:
‎-普莱提太太
‎-这里也有 ‎还有更多

translation.en: [Peggy] There's much more.
[Brown] Could you both, uh, cast your eyes on this, please?
I, uh, found it down between the strikes.
I believe that's a Merovingian tremissis.
translation.zh: ‎我相信这是一枚梅罗文加王朝的金币

translation.en: -Late 6th century. -[Phillips scoffs] Can't be.
translation.zh: ‎来自公元六世纪晚期 ‎不可能

translation.en: Viking East Anglia didn't have a coin-based economy till the 9th century.
translation.zh:
‎东盎格利亚的维京人
‎在公元九世纪才开始使用货币

translation.en: [Brown] Well, I think that the ship is older.
translation.zh: ‎我认为这艘船还要更古老些

translation.en: Mr. Brown has always said so.
This is Anglo-Saxon.
Piggott! Grimes!
It's Dark Age, by Jupiter!
translation.zh: ‎这艘船来自黑暗时代 我的老天！

translation.en: Sixth century!
This changes everything.
These people were not just marauding barterers.
translation.zh:
‎这些人不仅仅是喜欢四处劫掠
‎只懂得物物交换的野蛮人

translation.en: They had culture!
They had art!
They had money!
[Grimes] Well, Vikings are out the window.
-C.W., look. -[Peggy] God's sake.
Oh, good God.
[Phillips] Brown has just shown me a Merovingian tremissis.
translation.zh:
‎布朗刚刚给我看了
‎一枚梅罗文加王朝的金币

translation.en: -[crew laughs] -That's Anglo-Saxon.
[Phillips] It's incredible!
[Peggy] Hello. Are you camping out here?
[Robert] No. That's where my cousin Rory sleeps.
translation.zh: ‎不 这是我表舅罗伊睡的地方

translation.en: [Peggy] Is he not allowed indoors?
[Robert] No, he… he thinks the house is too hot.
translation.zh: ‎不是 他觉得屋里太闷热了

translation.en: -[Peggy chuckles] I can imagine. -[Robert] He's going to join the RAF.
translation.zh: ‎我能想象 ‎他即将加入皇家空军

translation.en: -Is he? -They're sending his papers any day.
translation.zh:
‎-是吗？
‎-他们随时都会寄通知书过来

translation.en: He's going to get his wings.
translation.zh: ‎他很快就会获得飞行资格了

translation.en: Well done, everybody, on a splendid effort.
Brailesford, Piggott,
if you'll start loading the gold into the car,
we'll get it straight to the British Museum.
translation.zh: ‎我们直接送到大英博物馆去

translation.en: [Pretty] I beg your pardon?
Well, it's the obvious place for it, Mrs. Pretty.
translation.zh: ‎送去那里是理所当然的 普莱提太太

translation.en: [Pretty] London is preparing for air raids.
The British Museum is currently being emptied of its treasures, isn't it?
translation.zh:
‎大英博物馆的珍宝目前正在被清空
‎不是吗？

translation.en: [Phillips] Uh, yes, but, um, it… it'll go to the lab.
translation.zh: ‎是 但… ‎我们会把它送去实验室

translation.en: [Pretty] This treasure came from someone's grave.
There'll be an inquest, as you know, and its fate will be decided there.
translation.zh:
‎如你所知 必将进行勘验
‎而其命运将在到时候见分晓

translation.en: Until then, Mr. Brown…
as the finder of this magnificent ship, would you please take the treasure up to the house?
translation.zh:
‎作为这艘宏伟的船的发现者
‎麻烦你将珍宝都带进屋里去

translation.en: Uh, yes, Mrs. Pretty.
Thank you all very much.
[Brown] Right, uh, gentlemen, I'll need some assistance. Mr. Lomax?
translation.zh: ‎好 绅士们 ‎我需要些帮助 洛马克斯先生

translation.en: [Phillips] This is most irregular.
[Grimes] It all belongs to Mrs. Pretty, doesn't it?
translation.zh: ‎一切都属于普莱提太太 对吧？

translation.en: It's found on her land.
[Piggott] Well, surely, the inquest will decide
whether the treasure belongs to Mrs. Pretty or the Crown.
translation.zh: ‎珍宝到底属于普莱提太太还是皇室

translation.en: [Phillips] Piggott, do you want this treasure to go to the Ipswich Museum?
translation.zh:
‎皮戈特 你希望珍宝
‎归属于伊普斯威奇博物馆吗？

translation.en: [Pretty] Am I doing the right thing?
It's someone's grave.
[Brown] No, that's… that's life what's revealed.
And that's why we dig.
[Pretty] Just in here. I think that's best.
translation.zh: ‎就这里 ‎我觉得放这里最好了

translation.en: They're like emissaries from another world.
translation.zh: ‎它们就像是来自另一个世界的使者

translation.en: [Rory] I used to camp with Robert's father, you see.
translation.zh: ‎我以前经常和罗伯特的父亲一起露营

translation.en: [Rory] I remember him telling me the calls of all the birds.
translation.zh:
‎我记得他教过我
‎如何识别各种鸟儿的叫声

translation.en: Now, whenever I hear nightingales, I think of these woods.
translation.zh:
‎现在 每当听到夜莺的叫声
‎我都会想起这片树林

translation.en: -[Peggy] Are there nightingales? -Haven't you heard them?
translation.zh:
‎-这里有夜莺吗？
‎-你没听到它们的叫声吗？

translation.en: [Peggy] No.
Never heard a nightingale at all. Only on the wireless.
translation.zh: ‎我没真正听过夜莺的叫声 ‎只在收音机上听说过

translation.en: There's a wonderful cellist called Beatrice Harrison.
translation.zh:
‎有一位很棒的大提琴家
‎名叫碧翠斯哈里森

translation.en: In the summer evenings, she used to practice in the garden, and…
translation.zh: ‎每当夏夜 她都会在花园里练琴

translation.en: one night, she was playing a scale, and a… a nightingale joined in.
translation.zh: ‎有天晚上 她正在练习音阶时 ‎一只夜莺加入进来了

translation.en: At first, she couldn't believe it. She started playing a sonata,
translation.zh:
‎她起初还不敢相信 ‎所以便开始演奏一首奏鸣曲
‎而夜莺也配合她唱了起来

translation.en: and the nightingale accompanied her.
translation.zh:
‎所以便开始演奏一首奏鸣曲
‎而夜莺也配合她唱了起来

translation.en: -[Rory] Really? -[Peggy] Mm-hmm. Yes.
[chuckles] Yes. It happened again the next night and next night.
translation.zh:
‎是啊 接下来的两个晚上
‎同样的事又发生了

translation.en: Miss Harrison was so excited about it, she went to the BBC and told them all about it.
translation.zh:
‎哈里森女士兴奋不已
‎并将这件事告诉了英国广播公司

translation.en: [Rory] And? [Peggy] So, a few evenings later,
the BBC came and put their recording equipment in Miss Harrison's garden.
translation.zh:
‎英国广播公司在哈里森女士的花园里
‎安装了录音设备

translation.en: She started to play, and they waited and, um, waited…
translation.zh: ‎她开始演奏 他们等了又等

translation.en: and…
and at last, the nightingale began to sing.
Went on for about 15 minutes…
rising and falling with the cello.
translation.zh: ‎歌声随着大提琴声跌宕起伏

translation.en: -No. -[both laughing]
-Yes. -Wow.
I know. Hmm.
But… the really extraordinary thing is that…
translation.zh: ‎不过 真正不可思议的是

translation.en: other people who'd been listening to the broadcast in their gardens
translation.zh: ‎其他在花园里收听广播的人

translation.en: reported that other nightingales also started to sing.
translation.zh: ‎说其他夜莺也开始唱起了歌来

translation.en: Well, that's wonderful.
Yes, it was. It was wonderful.
[Piggott] Margaret!
-Come on! -[Peggy sighs] All right. Hmm.
Well… good night.
I shall listen out for cellos in the woods.
translation.zh: ‎我会留心听树林里的大提琴声的

translation.en: "Cellos." [mumbles]
-[Brailesford] Here we are, chaps. -[Phillips] All right.
[Brailesford] Well, we are unburying a legend.
-Beowulf. -Arthur, King of the Britons.
Cheers.
Talk about Dark Ages. I can hardly see my pint.
translation.zh:
‎说到黑暗时代
‎我都看不见我的啤酒了

translation.en: What actually is that?
[Piggott] It's the, uh, trial blackouts, C.W.
So Germans will be coming by air this time, will they?
translation.zh: ‎所以德军这次要坐飞机过来吗？

translation.en: Last time, they came by the river.
In AD 600.
You know, I'm… It's been a big day. I'm quite done in.
translation.zh: ‎那个… ‎今天忙了一整天 我也累坏了

translation.en: Um, will you all excuse me?
translation.zh: ‎今天忙了一整天 我也累坏了  ‎我先失陪了

translation.en: -Aw. -Well done, Mrs. P, on a marvelous find.
[Brailesford] Yes. Cheers to your clever wife!
-Yeah. No, I'll come with you, darling. -No.
No, no. Um, surely you want to celebrate.
-Stay for another, Piggott. -My round. Set them up again, would you?
translation.zh: ‎留下再喝一杯吧 皮戈特 ‎这轮我请客 再上一轮啤酒 谢谢

translation.en: I say, C.W., ask him if he'll take a Merovingian tremissis.
translation.zh: ‎我说 小查 ‎问他接不接受梅罗文加王朝的金币

translation.en: [radio announcer] …the press campaign,
the menacing statements of the statesmen leading the policy of Germany,
translation.zh:
‎负责执行德国政策的政治家
‎所发表的威胁性言论

translation.en: the systematic provocation of frontier incidents,
and finally, the constantly increasing concentrations of mobilized armed forces
translation.zh:
‎以及波兰边境上
‎数量不断增加的武装部队

translation.en: at the Polish frontiers constitute an obvious proof of this.
translation.zh:
‎以及波兰边境上
‎数量不断增加的武装部队 ‎促成了此项明显之举：

translation.en: A Labour deputation called on the Prime Minister last night,
requesting the immediate evacuation of women, children, and cripples
translation.zh: ‎立即撤离所有妇女、儿童和残疾人

translation.en: as precaution against the sudden outbreak of war.
[man 1 in film] He'll find Buck Rogers if anybody can.
[man 2 in film] Get the guards, you fools!
translation.zh:
‎快找守卫 你们这帮蠢蛋！ ‎如果他们成功逃走的话
‎我就让你们都加入机器人部队！

translation.en: If they get away, I'll put every man of you in the robot battalion!
translation.zh:
‎如果他们成功逃走的话
‎我就让你们都加入机器人部队！

translation.en: [whispering] Not yet.
Not yet. [sniffles]
Darling, C.W. wants me to take some of the corroded iron to the lab.
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 ‎小查让我把一些锈铁送到实验室去

translation.en: Uh, we think it might be fragmented armor,
translation.zh: ‎我们觉得那可能是碎裂的铠甲

translation.en: and I… I badly want to start cleaning it up. So…
translation.zh: ‎而我非常想开始对其进行清理 所以…

translation.en: Am I to come with you?
No, because C.W. needs all the hands he can get here, so, uh…
translation.zh:
‎不 因为小查这里
‎需要尽可能多的人手 ‎而且他对你的表现非常满意

translation.en: And he's very pleased with you.
translation.zh: ‎而且他对你的表现非常满意

translation.en: -Is he? -[Piggott] Mm.
Uh, so I'm taking Brailesford because the lab's really his thing.
translation.zh:
‎但我会带上布雷斯福德
‎因为实验室的事是他的专长

translation.en: You're going to have to be a brick about it, Margaret. [Peggy] Peggy.
translation.zh:
‎-你得通情达理点 玛格丽特
‎-佩吉

translation.en: My name's Peggy.
I'll… I'll… I'll miss you very much, Peggy.
Sorry to take him away from you.
translation.zh: ‎把他从你身边带走真是抱歉

translation.en: [Peggy] It was very kind of you to invite me, Mrs. Pretty.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你邀请我 普莱提太太

translation.en: [Pretty] You can't possibly stay in that pub without your husband.
translation.zh: ‎你丈夫不在 你还是别去酒吧为好

translation.en: Mr. Phillips would bore you quite to death.
translation.zh: ‎菲利普斯先生会让你无聊至死的

translation.en: Um, have you developed any of your photographs yet, Mr. Lomax?
translation.zh:
‎你拍的照片已经洗出来了吗
‎洛马克斯先生？

translation.en: I've made a start. I've got a mountain to do, and I better get through them.
translation.zh:
‎是开始洗了 ‎但还有一大堆要洗
‎我得尽快完成才行

translation.en: I could get my papers any day.
Rory has been accepted into the RAF.
Should I congratulate you?
I don't know. Cousin Edith didn't.
translation.zh: ‎不知道 ‎伊迪丝表姐没祝贺我

translation.en: This looks delicious.
[Pretty] Bon appétit.
[Pretty] Don't be too long, now, darling. It's late.
translation.zh: ‎别玩太久 亲爱的 很晚了

translation.en: [Brown] And now, that's a partial eclipse of the moon.
[Pretty] And don't run.
[Pretty] Oh, dear.
-[Pretty] Isn't that a bad omen? -[Brown] Well, they used to think so.
translation.zh: ‎那不是个凶兆吗？ ‎人们过去是这么认为的

translation.en: [Pretty] It does make you feel the gods are angry.
translation.zh: ‎确实让人觉得是众神发怒了

translation.en: The people who buried that ship…
What did they believe?
[Brown] Well… they were sailing somewhere, weren't they?
translation.zh: ‎这个嘛 ‎他们乘着船前往某处 不是吗？

translation.en: Down to the underworld or up to the stars.
translation.zh: ‎地下的阴间 天上的星星

translation.en: [Pretty] Wherever we go when we die.
[Phillips] So we're rather coming to the dregs, aren't we?
translation.zh: ‎看来是挖到底部了 对吧？

translation.en: The coroner has been in touch.
An inquest has been called for Friday, and your presence is required.
translation.zh:
‎勘验将于本周五进行
‎到时候需要你在场

translation.en: There's been quite a lot of public interest in our ship.
translation.zh: ‎我们这艘船引起了民众的极大关注

translation.en: So afterwards, I've invited everyone to come and see it.
translation.zh:
‎所以我邀请了大家
‎在勘验之后过来看看

translation.en: Uh… everyone?
[Pretty] The villagers are coming and my friends from the county.
translation.zh:
‎村民们会过来
‎还有我来自县的朋友们

translation.en: May I remind you just how fragile this site is?
translation.zh: ‎容我提醒你 这是极其脆弱的遗址

translation.en: Please feel free to invite your families and friends.
translation.zh: ‎也可以邀请你们的家人朋友们

translation.en: Mrs. Pretty…
Good God.
[Pretty] Robert?
Don't let anyone swim! It's tidal. The current is fierce!
translation.zh:
‎别让任何人下水
‎那是潮汐水域 水流湍急

translation.en: They train these boys on rickety planes from the Great War.
translation.zh:
‎他们训练这些孩子
‎用的是一战残留的破旧飞机

translation.en: My husband said, "If you want your son to die, then let him join the Air Force."
translation.zh:
‎我丈夫总说 若想让自己的儿子丧命
‎就让他加入空军

translation.en: [Peggy] They say this war will be fought in the air.
[Robert] What happened, Mother?
Is he all right?
-I must get Robert up to the house. -Shall I take him for you?
translation.zh:
‎我得让罗伯特回到屋里去 ‎-让我来吧
‎-他不会愿意回去的

translation.en: -He won't want to go. -Uh, I'll ask him to look after me.
translation.zh:
‎-让我来吧
‎-他不会愿意回去的 ‎我让他照顾我不就得了

translation.en: [Pretty] Thank you.
[Peggy] Robert!
-[Robert] Yes? -[Peggy sighs] I… I feel rather faint.
Oh, well, when I feel faint, I have a good lie-down
translation.zh: ‎每次头晕的时候 我会躺下休息

translation.en: and a big glass of water.
-[Peggy] Do you? -[Robert] And that does the trick. [Peggy] That's what I need.
translation.zh:
‎-通常都很管用
‎-那正是我所需要的

translation.en: -Will you take my hand? -[Robert] Sure.
[Peggy] His name was David Atkinson. It was his second solo flight.
translation.zh: ‎他的名字是大卫阿特金森 ‎这是他的第二次单飞

translation.en: Police and the coroner are here. I brought you some dry things.
translation.zh: ‎警察和验尸官来了 ‎我给你带了些干衣服

translation.en: [Rory] I've got some coffee back at my tent.
Would you like some?
[Peggy] My father drowned…
on a holiday in Cornwall.
He was taken by the current.
-[Rory] I'm sorry. -[Peggy] Oh, no.
It was a long time ago.
He had epilepsy.
So, what drew you to photography?
[Rory] Oh, I suppose it's, um…
It's just a way of trying to fix things as they…
translation.zh: ‎我想 这只是一种 ‎尝试弥补要过去的东西的方式

translation.en: as they go past.
translation.zh: ‎尝试弥补要过去的东西的方式

translation.en: -[Peggy] Mm. -[Rory] Keep what's vital from being lost.
translation.zh:
‎将重要的事物保存起来
‎不让它们流逝

translation.en: My father once gave me an old coin…
translation.zh: ‎我父亲曾给过我一枚旧硬币

translation.en: and he said it was from the time of Caesar Augustus.
translation.zh: ‎他说那来自凯萨奥古斯都时代

translation.en: And I knew the story from the Bible where Jesus showed the disciples a coin.
translation.zh:
‎我知道圣经里有个故事
‎说耶稣向门徒们展示了一枚硬币

translation.en: "Render unto Caesar the things that are Caesar's."
-[chuckles lightly] -Yes.
And I… [sighs]
…well, I… I became convinced that the coin I had
translation.zh: ‎我当时坚信我所拥有的硬币

translation.en: was the one that Jesus had actually shown the disciples.
translation.zh: ‎就是耶稣向门徒展示的那枚硬币

translation.en: I used to marvel that I could hold it.
translation.zh: ‎能把它握在手里 曾让我惊叹不已

translation.en: What happened to your coin?
-I wear it. [chuckles] -[Rory gasps]
I thought it might bring me luck.
translation.zh: ‎我想它也许会给我带来好运

translation.en: And has it?
If 1,000 years…
were to pass in an instant…
what would be left of us?
[Peggy] This.
And parts of your watch.
Torch.
Fragments of the mug.
[Rory] But every last scrap of you and I would… disappear.
translation.zh: ‎但你我身上的每一寸肌肤 ‎都会消失不见

translation.en: -[Rory] Listen. -[nightingales singing]
[Peggy] What?
[Robert] The pilot died, didn't he?
Yes, darling.
Wait.
-[sighs, breathing shakily] -[Robert] Rory won't die, will he?
I'm sorry.
No.
You won't die?
[Peggy] Mrs. Pretty?
-[Peggy] Are you unwell? -I've, um…
-Perhaps you might lead me to my room. -Yes, of course. Of course.
translation.zh:
‎-麻烦你扶我回房间去
‎-好 没问题

translation.en: -[groaning] -[Peggy] Are you all right?
[Pretty laughing weakly] Yes! Yes.
-[Peggy] Should I call a doctor? -[Pretty] No, no, no. It's…
translation.zh:
‎-要我打电话叫医生吗？
‎-不用 ‎只是胃灼热而已

translation.en: It's heartburn. It's…
-[Pretty gasping] -[Peggy] Mrs. Pretty, are you all right?
[Pretty] I'm such a bore.
Would you mind… Would you mind getting me some milk?
-[Peggy] Yes. -Thank you.
-[Peggy] Are you sure? -[sobbing] Yes, thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-你确定你没事吗？
‎-嗯 谢谢

translation.en: -[Peggy] Oh. -Robert! Darling…
-[grunts] -[Brown] Oh! Robert.
-[Robert groans] -[Brown] You all right?
[Brown] Robert?
I know she's sick. I know it! There's nothing I can do!
translation.zh:
‎我就知道她病了 我就知道
‎但我帮不到她

translation.en: Why is there nothing I can do? I should be able to make her better.
translation.zh:
‎我为什么帮不到她？
‎我应该能让她感觉好点才对

translation.en: You do. You do make her better.
[Robert] No, she's worse. She is, I can see it!
translation.zh: ‎不 她情况更糟了 我看得出来

translation.en: When… When my father died…
…everyone said I had to look after my mother.
translation.zh: ‎大家都说我必须好好照顾我母亲

translation.en: [sniffles] And I failed.
I failed.
Robert…
…we all fail.
Every day.
There are some things we just can't succeed at…
translation.zh: ‎有些事不管我们再怎么努力

translation.en: no matter how hard we try.
I know it's not what you want to hear.
I… I'm stronger than she thinks I am.
[Brown] I know. Perhaps you'll show her.
translation.zh: ‎我知道 ‎也许你能用行动证明给她看

translation.en: Now…
we should get you inside, Robert.
Come on.
I think it's time for your bed, you know. Come on, then.
[Phillips] Apparently, there's a whole convoy of hacks on the way.
translation.zh: ‎听说一大群三流记者正前往这里

translation.en: I already have some joker from the Sunday Mirror asking me
translation.zh:
‎已经有某个
‎来自《星期日镜报》的傻叉问我

translation.en: if the ship is still seaworthy.
So, what happens to the treasure? That's the real question.
translation.zh: ‎那些珍宝会怎么样？ ‎这才是重点

translation.en: [radio announcer] Germany has invaded Poland… [Piggott] Have you seen my wife? …and has bombed many towns.
translation.zh:
‎-德国已入侵波兰 并炸毁了多个城镇
‎-小查 你看见我妻子了吗？

translation.en: Orders completing the mobilization of the Navy, Army, and Air Force
translation.zh: ‎国王在今天下午举行的枢密院会议上

translation.en: were signed by the King at a meeting this afternoon of the privy council.
translation.zh: ‎签下了海军、陆军和空军的动员令

translation.en: [radio announcer 2] The King and Queen decided... [Phillips sighs] Well.
translation.zh: ‎国王和王后已决定暂时留在白金汉宫

translation.en: Here we go, then.
The Queen drove from the palace to visit the Westminister ARP headquarters.
translation.zh:
‎…王后已前往
‎威斯敏斯特空袭预防总部参观

translation.en: [Rory] I've just received this.
I'm to report to RAF Martlesham this morning.
translation.zh:
‎我今早必须到
‎马特尔舍姆皇家空军基地报到

translation.en: There's the inquest.
[scoffs] It's my medical assessment. I can't… I can't bunk it. Sorry.
translation.zh: ‎我不能错过我的体检 抱歉

translation.en: I put some photographs in the dining room for your guests.
translation.zh:
‎我为你的客人们
‎在饭厅里摆放了一些照片

translation.en: Rory, I'm telling you in no uncertain terms that you cannot possibly die.
translation.zh: ‎罗伊 我要明确地告诉你 你不可以死

translation.en: [Pretty] I'm saying this most seriously. Don't you dare put yourself in danger.
translation.zh:
‎我是认真的
‎你不准让自己处于危险之中

translation.en: Well… I'm not sure I shall have much choice. [chuckles]
Robert is going to need you.
Do you understand?
[Brown] Good morning, Robert.
-Today's the day. -I want to take my mother sailing.
translation.zh:
‎-就是今天了
‎-我想带我母亲出航

translation.en: I don't think that ship is sailing anywhere. You know, it's just compacted sand.
translation.zh:
‎那艘船恐怕是无法出航了
‎它只是一堆被压实的沙子

translation.en: There's nothing holding it, except time.
-That won't matter. Not where we're going. -Now, where's that, then?
translation.zh: ‎那不会影响我们要去的地方 ‎那是哪儿？

translation.en: -Will you come? -[Brown] Well, if I'm invited, I'll come.
translation.zh: ‎你会一起来吗？ ‎如果受到邀请的话 我就去

translation.en: -Morning. -[Rory] Hello.
Those for me?
[laughs] No, I'm looking for my wife.
Well, perhaps you'd say goodbye for me.
I've been called up.
Of course.
Well, best of British.
Stuart.
[Piggott] I… I bought you these.
How lovely.
Um, Lomax was just telling me that he's been called up.
translation.zh: ‎洛马克斯刚刚告诉我他被征召入伍了

translation.en: -Uh, well, it… -[Rory] Um…
Uh, I'd better go. Goodbye.
[radio announcer] According to an official telegram, Warsaw has been bombed six times today.
translation.zh:
‎根据官方电报
‎华沙今天已遭到六次轰炸

translation.en: The telegram adds that fighting of a most serious nature continues on the whole length of the front.
translation.zh:
‎电报还补充说
‎激烈的战斗将在整个前线继续进行

translation.en: We're in for another bloody mess.
[reporter 1] Oh, here we go. Did you hear the results?
-[reporter 2] I just want a quick photo! -[woman] Mrs. Pretty!
[officer] Please, make way.
[Brown] Make way, please.
-Do you want me in the car with you? -[Pretty] Yes.
[Brown] Maynard! Maynard!
Maynard? Can you make sure my wife gets in the house?
translation.zh: ‎梅纳德 麻烦你送我妻子回屋里去

translation.en: [Phillips] I… I hope I have the opportunity to speak to you later.
translation.zh: ‎我希望等下有机会和你交谈

translation.en: -[woman 2] Mrs. Pretty? -[woman 3] Mrs. Pretty!
[sobbing] I'm terribly sorry.
Thank you. Thank you.
[Phillips] These people were not savage warriors.
These… These… These were…
These were sophisticated people with incredible artistry.
translation.zh: ‎这些人有文化、有教养 ‎而且艺术造诣极深

translation.en: The Dark Ages are no longer dark.
This is sherry. I suppose it's sherry, is it? [May] I don't know.
Should we drink it now, or is there going to be a toast?
translation.zh:
‎你觉得应该现在喝吗？
‎还是会有祝酒辞？

translation.en: What's everyone else doing?
[Pretty] The artifacts discovered here have caused a national sensation.
translation.zh: ‎在此处发现的遗物 引起了全国轰动

translation.en: [Pretty] You must all know by now that they were recovered from a chamber in the middle of a ship…
translation.zh:
‎想必大家都已经知道
‎遗物是在船中间的墓室里找到的

translation.en: a burial ship, engineered from oak.
translation.zh: ‎那是一艘用橡木制造的葬船

translation.en: In my opinion, the greatest and most beautiful treasure of all.
translation.zh:
‎在我看来
‎那是最伟大、最美丽的瑰宝

translation.en: Ninety feet long, lying east to west.
Found and excavated by Mr. Basil Brown.
translation.zh: ‎由巴兹尔布朗先生发现并挖掘

translation.en: -To Basil! -Mr. Brown!
I'm terribly sorry.
I thought you'd be pleased with the verdict.
translation.zh: ‎我以为得到这样的结果 你会很开心

translation.en: [Pretty] We die.
We die and we decay.
We don't live on.
I'm not sure I agree.
From the first human handprint on a cave wall…
translation.zh: ‎从人类在洞壁上留下第一个手印开始

translation.en: we're part of something continuous.
translation.zh: ‎我们就在历史上一直存在着

translation.en: [Brown] So, we… don't really die.
translation.zh: ‎所以 我们并不会真正的死去

translation.en: -[footsteps approaching] -[Pretty] Rory put these out this morning.
It completely slipped my mind.
Sit down.
[Pretty] I'm sure work like yours is very sustaining…
translation.zh: ‎我相信你从事的这份工作非常有意义

translation.en: but it's not enough.
Life is very fleeting.
I've learnt that.
It has moments you should seize.
It could not be a better result, Mrs. Pretty.
translation.zh: ‎这样的结果再好不过了 普莱提太太

translation.en: The whole of Suffolk has been on your side.
translation.zh:
‎-整个萨福克郡一直都站在你这边
‎-嗯

translation.en: -[Pretty] Yes. -I saw you in her car.
translation.zh:
‎-整个萨福克郡一直都站在你这边
‎-嗯 ‎我看到你跟着她上车了

translation.en: Did she mention her intentions?
-About the tea? -[scoffs] About the treasure, man.
translation.zh: ‎关于茶吗？ ‎关于珍宝 天啊

translation.en: -Oh. -Yes, what's she planning?
We hope that you'll agree that the Ipswich Museum is the perfect place for--
translation.zh:
‎希望你会同意
‎伊普斯威奇博物馆是最理想的…

translation.en: -Can we talk another time? Excuse me. -Yes, absolutely. Absolutely. Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-我们下次再谈吧 失陪了
‎-好 没问题

translation.en: [Phillips] She trusts you, man.
Don't let her give it to Ipswich.
translation.zh: ‎别让她把珍宝交给伊普斯威奇博物馆

translation.en: The British Museum would buy everything.
translation.zh: ‎大英博物馆会出钱买下一切

translation.en: It's priceless, of course, but she'll have to be reasonable.
translation.zh:
‎国宝无价 那是当然
‎但她也得开个合理的价钱

translation.en: Are you asking me to plead your case?
Have some lemon drizzle cake, Mr. Phillips.
translation.zh: ‎吃点柠檬糖霜蛋糕吧 菲利普斯先生

translation.en: It is most refreshing.
Thank you so much for what you said. I could have cheered.
translation.zh:
‎谢谢你刚才说的那番话
‎我简直想大声欢呼

translation.en: [Pretty] My son has formed a strong attachment.
translation.zh: ‎我儿子对他产生了深厚的感情

translation.en: [May] Basil's very fond of him, too.
Perhaps you might let him visit you from time to time.
translation.zh: ‎也许你能让他偶尔去你们家做客

translation.en: Of course. We'd be glad to.
C.W.'s suggesting we make a move to the ball.
translation.zh: ‎小查建议我们开始前往舞会现场

translation.en: Hmm. Well, I think that you should go on… [clears throat] …uh, without me.
translation.zh: ‎你还是自己去吧 别等我了

translation.en: So, will… will you follow us?
I…
I don't think so.
No.
We both have our own paths to, um, follow, don't we?
translation.zh: ‎你我都有各自想走的路 对吧？

translation.en: And I've seen you when you're happy.
You're rather beautiful.
-I'm happy with you. -[sighs lightly]
-I could… I could learn to be. -[Peggy sighs]
I think that would be an awful shame.
[Brailesford] Stuart! Shall we wait?
[Phillips] Let's… Let's go. Come on.
Go on.
Go on.
May… [clicks tongue]
That site, it needs to be made safe for the future,
translation.zh: ‎为了下一代 遗址必须予以保存

translation.en: so it… it don't further decay. So…
translation.zh: ‎为了下一代 遗址必须予以保存 ‎以防止进一步衰朽

translation.en: that's another week's work.
[May] You say your goodbyes to the old girl.
Do you take care of her.
You… You don't want to stay the night?
I'll see you next week.
[Brown] I'll line the hull with hessian…
and cover that with a… a layer of branches…
to protect it from the weight of the earth.
All this soil's got to go back in.
Leave it as we found it.
I'm giving the treasure to the British Museum.
translation.zh: ‎我打算将珍宝交给大英博物馆

translation.en: As a gift.
It should be where the greatest number of people can freely see it.
translation.zh:
‎那应该收藏在
‎最多民众能够自由欣赏的地方

translation.en: I haven't told them yet.
I wanted to tell you.
[clicks tongue] Well, that's a… That's a hell of a big gift.
[chuckles softly] I don't know anyone's ever made a gift as big as that.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道还有谁会送如此贵重的礼物

translation.en: Apparently, they haven't.
I also told Mr. Phillips that I expect your work to receive proper recognition.
translation.zh:
‎我还告诉了菲利普斯先生
‎我希望你的贡献能得到适当的认可

translation.en: Thank you.
-[Robert] Steer it steady, Mr. Brown. -[Brown] Aye, aye.
translation.zh: ‎把稳航向 布朗先生 ‎遵命

translation.en: We're coming towards the edge of the atmosphere.
Can you see it, Mother?
We're sailing into the cosmos.
Yes, I can. Where are we heading?
translation.zh: ‎我看到了 我们要去哪儿？

translation.en: Orion's Belt, to take the Queen home.
translation.zh: ‎猎户腰带 把女王送回家

translation.en: [Pretty] Which Queen?
This boat's hers. Her people gave her treasure for her home voyage.
translation.zh: ‎这艘船属于她 ‎她的人民为她的远航献上了珍宝

translation.en: [Robert] And she was sad when the ship came…
translation.zh: ‎当船来接她时 她感到很难过

translation.en: because she knew she'd be leaving everyone behind.
translation.zh: ‎因为她知道她即将离开大家

translation.en: And she was worried
that they wouldn't get on very well without her…
translation.zh: ‎没了她 大家的日子会很难过

translation.en: but she knew she had to follow the King into the sky.
translation.zh: ‎但她知道她必须跟随国王飞向天空

translation.en: And so, she set off…
through the Earth and up into the cosmos.
-Space is a funny thing. -[Pretty chuckles]
Time operates quite differently up there, and 500 years can pass in a flash.
translation.zh: ‎在那里 时间的运作方式大不相同  ‎五百年一眨眼就过去了

translation.en: And the Queen looked back down to Earth.
She could see that her son had grown up and that he was now a space pilot.
translation.zh: ‎她看到自己的儿子已经长大了 ‎现在是一名太空飞行员

translation.en: [Robert] And she knew that when he made his first journey up to the stars,
translation.zh: ‎而她知道 ‎当他首次踏上前往星星的旅程时

translation.en: she would be there to meet him.
[Chamberlain on radio] This morning, the British ambassador
translation.zh: ‎今天早上 英国驻柏林大使

translation.en: in Berlin handed the German government a final note…
translation.zh: ‎今天早上 英国驻柏林大使 ‎向德国政府下达最后通牒

translation.en: stating that, unless we heard from them by 11 o'clock,
translation.zh: ‎若在十一点之前未收到德国的答复

translation.en: that they were prepared at once to withdraw their troops from Poland,
translation.zh: ‎表示愿意立即从波兰全面撤军

translation.en: a state of war would exist between us.
translation.zh: ‎德英两国随即进入战争状态

translation.en: I have to tell you now that no such undertaking has been received,
translation.zh:
‎我必须告诉大家
‎我们并未收到任何答复

translation.en: and that, consequently, this country is at war with Germany.
[Chamberlain] You can imagine what a bitter blow it is to me
translation.zh: ‎你可以想象 ‎这对我是何等沉重的打击

translation.en: that all my long struggle to win peace has failed.
translation.zh:
‎我为争取和平进行了长期不懈的努力
‎但均告失败

translation.en: [Chamberlain] The government have made plans
under which it will be possible to carry on the work of the nation
translation.zh: ‎以便在接下来难熬的日子里

translation.en: in the days of stress and strain that may be ahead…
…but these plans need your help.
translation.zh: ‎但这些计划需要你帮忙实现

translation.en: [Chamberlain] You may be taking your part in the fighting services
or as a volunteer.
If so, you will report for duty
translation.zh: ‎如是这样 请按照收到的指示

translation.en: in accordance with the instructions you receive.
[Chamberlain] It is of vital importance that you should carry on with your jobs.
translation.zh: ‎工作必须继续进行 这一点至关重要

translation.en: Now, may God bless you all.
